Already Gigantic: The giantess is a gigantic size when you find out about her.(Not necessarily already 1 mile. Anywhere from 12 feet+ at the start is fine)

Other: Other!

11.title: Growth Spurts

111.content:
Original Author: Super5ora

Your name is Magen, a 15 year old girl, and your current heigth is 5'6. You were just a average high school girl, and you always have friends that look out for you... And your a gamer girl. But lets get to the fun stuff.

It was a fine saterday, and you got up for a perfect plan-out day (Minecraft...). But you can't start the day with out breakfast. Your secretly rich and live by yourself, but atleast your responsible. And you have a maid name Beverly who look out for you. She made you your favorite breakfast. Later after breakfast you got out of your pugamus, and changed in to one of your favorite saterday clothes. Then you did your normal saterday morning stuff, you were really, REALLY happy eversence your birthday came, which was a week ago. Beverly told you to find something different about yourself now, you could hit peuberty now. During the morning you felt a little sudder in your body, and complitly ignored it. But unaware, you were growing slowly. You wer now...
111.title: Puberty hits to hard

choices: "I dreamed that you had done something to me..."
"I dreamed that I was Meganite the Relentless, my WoW character..."
1112.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

Over the course of the morning, you had felt a minor shudder and as a result had grown about three inches, putting you at 5'9. You ignored it, mistaking it for a brief draft. What else could it be, right? Oh how wrong you were, and didn't even know it yet... How could you know that this was the start of something bigger than anyone would have guessed? You were just your average American teenager with long brown hair, green eyes, and...admittedly a little paler skin than what might be considered healthy. Your mom always said that you should get out more, instead of sitting behind a computer monitor all day playing Minecraft, World of Warcraft, and whatnot... You couldn't help that you liked making things in Minecraft, or beating the pants off some poor sap in PvP with your level 85 death knight when you weren't partaking in a raid and keeping your party from being wiped with the very same death knight. (the irony of your character keeping her comrades from death despite her class' name being death knight wasn't lost on you) But when you did go out, your personality made sure you did not go unnoticed...despite the lack of any significant curves to speak of yet. Perhaps puberty will change that once it finally hit, although you were unaware that it was beginning to do so right now...and may never stop... Your maid, Beverly, noticed that you had just been standing there, motionless as a rock aside from the shudder earlier.

"Miss Megan? Is everything alright?" She asked in her ever friendly, calm tone with a slight tinge of concern.

You're snapped out of your thoughts and reply, "Oh! It's nothing, Beverly, thank you. Although I must admit, I had the strangest dream last night..."

Beverly gave a slight inquisitive look as she asked you, "Really? Do tell, Miss Megan. I would like to hear what it was."

You described your dream...
1112.title: 5'9, the start of your ever growing adventure.

choices: Change your plans. You could use a little fresh air.
Keep with your original plan and play some Minecraft
11121.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

"I dreamed that I was in this wonderful little cyan bikini, you know my favorite color and all, but I was standing in the middle of the city. I have no idea how I got there, but then I felt really good. When I looked down at myself, I had boobs! Honest to goodness boobs! And then... I..." You trailed off, not quite sure how to put the next part.

Beverly continued with her slight inquisitive look, tilting her head as she asked, "And then you...what? You can't just leave this intriguing tale on a cliffhanger, Miss Megan. What happened?"

You sighed and then continued to describe your dream with, "I...started growing. Slowly at first, as I didn't notice what was happening until I started looking down at some boy. I think he might have been in his senior year, so maybe three years older than me? Anyway, once I noticed that I was growing, everyone started to run away from me as it picked up in speed. Soon I was as tall as the tallest skyscraper, and then my body started destroying everything in sight as I continued to get even bigger... And then, just before my head outgrew the atmosphere...I woke up."

Beverly's smile faded after hearing out the rest of your dream. While she was aware that you secretly always wanted to grow bigger, especially in the curves department which you sorely lacked aside from a very slight pudginess in your belly, (hours exercising your fingers on a keyboard =/= actual exercise) your maid was concerned about what were to happen should that desire become reality given the description of your latest dream. She cleaned off the table from your breakfast together earlier, (you had insisted that she have her meals with you since the first time you met her. She was like family to you, and wished for her to feel the same) and proceeded to the kitchen to attend to the dishes. You followed her, knowing that when her smile faded, something troubled her. Finally, Beverly voiced what was eating at her.

"So, you dreamed that you had become a destructive giantess. Do I have that right?"

You nodded slowly, and then responded worriedly, "Yes. Beverly, you know I would love to become a giantess, or even just a little bit taller. But never, and I mean never on my grandmother's grave, would I want to be the destructive kind. That dream scared me for what I could do like that... But thankfully, that sort of thing never happens in real life, right?"

As you discussed the matter with Beverly, you noticed that your pitiful excuse for a bra and panties were starting to feel a tad...uncomfortable. You put it off as being effectively the same bra and panties you've had since you were twelve or thirteen. What was the point in buying new ones when the old ones still fit? Unconsciously you fiddle with the straps a little, completely unaware that your virtually flat chest and backside were beginning to gain a semblance of definition. And that you had gained another inch, putting you at 5'10. "Huh, this bra fit just fine when I put them on this morning..." You mumbled.

Your thirty-five year old maid returned to her usual smile. With this development, she saw an opportunity to get you out of the house and away from your computer monitor, if only for a little while. She said, suggesting, "Perhaps it's time for you to go shopping for new clothes? By the sound of it, your old ones are on their way out, Miss Megan." Beverly then put the now clean and hand-dried dishes away where they belonged, then proceeded out of the kitchen to perform more of her duties. You decided to...
11121.title: "I dreamed that I was gigantic..."

choices: The cyan bikini from your dream. Freaky.
The frilliest pink swimsuit you've ever seen in your life. Really?
111211.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

Change your plans for the day. You had planned on playing some Minecraft, but really that could wait. Besides, even a gamer girl such as yourself needed to get out and interact with the real world. So you reluctantly hopped into your limousine, (you aren't old enough to drive, and you disliked flaunting your fortune for fear of being labelled with the stereotypes that go with it. Or gaining 'friends' that just stuck with you because you had money and lots of it) and told the driver where to go.

"The mall, please. And please park in the usual spot once we get there." To which the driver nodded in his rear view mirror and replied, "Of course, Miss Megan." before he started the engine and drove to the mall. On the way, your body imperceptibly grew another inch, putting you at 5'11 now though you were still oblivious to, and you chest and butt swelled out a teensy bit more to which you were also oblivious to aside from the further discomfort from your bra and panties. Now, if these five inches gained so far had happened all at once, you might have noticed something by now...

Once the limo arrived at the mall, the driver parked it in the back parking lot as far out of the way as possible, as per your usual request. Unfortunately, your best friend Sara saw you getting out of the limo. You were letting yourself out as you didn't want to waited on hand and foot all the time; once in a while was more than enough, though you could never honestly say that the limo ride was ever unpleasant... Still, you hoped she wouldn't recognize you... "Megan! Megan, is that you? I didn't know that you were rich!" Sadly, that hope was in vain. You turned to her, and not knowing just how close she was, ended up with a face full of her chest.

Sara was a towering 6'5, easily the tallest girl in school. Most of the staff had to look up at her. One of the most well endowed girls in school, with DD boobs that left boys pining like puppies should she lean forward in their direction, and wore outfits that teased the very limits of the dress code. Her ass was also nice though nothing to write home about. And with blonde hair and blue eyes, she could be suspected to be a ditzy air-head...except she wasn't. Not the best grades in class, but she was far from brainless. How such a bombshell and a slightly pudgy stick that usually described you became such best of friends, many would never know. The secret was that the two of you had been friends since kindergarten. And even back then she was tall enough to look as though she had been held back a grade.

"Hi, Sara..." You answered back halfheartedly, once you got your head out of her cleavage. "Guess my secret's out... Yeah, I've got money and lots of it. But I don't like to flaunt it as then people may get the wrong impression of me. And don't get me started about 'friends', who would only like me as long as I have money to leech from..." Sara's expression turned to one of understanding. "So that's why you never invited me to sleep over at your house when we were in grade school? I can certainly understand your concern, but I believe most of the friends you have now like you for you. Just be yourself and don't give a care what anyone else thinks. Now, how about you and I do some shopping?" You look at her quizzically before she quickly added, "I'll pay for my own stuff, of course!"

Feeling relieved that your best friend wasn't angry at you, you agreed to go clothes shopping. You oddly found it not so hard to keep up with Sara's long strides in her high heels today, but otherwise thought nothing of it. It was Summer, so beach clothes were in, and after buying a couple pairs of somewhat bigger bras and panties, and a few other things, Sara practically dragged you into the swimsuit boutique that was her favorite store and away from Electronics Boutique, your favorite store. She insisted, "Megan, I was shopping here last week and I saw this cute little outfit that is totally you! If we're lucky, it's still there!"

Knowing that you'd get further talking to a rock than convince Sara to let you go, you relented and stayed put in the store until she came back from the back with the outfit she was talking about. "See? It's totally you!" She beamed. When you looked at what she brought out, you were alarmed to find that it was...
111211.title: Change of plans. Shopping!

1112111.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

The bikini from your odd dream last night! There was no mistaking it: from the shape of the bottom piece to the cupping shape of the top piece to even the thick, slightly darker cyan string that also bordered the bikini, this was exactly the same one. It even looked like it would fit you perfectly! You were completely stunned, and perhaps a tad scared. Was your dream actually a vision of what was to come? That your destiny was to destroy everyone and everything you ever held dear and much of what you didn't necessarily as you outgrew the Earth, and that this...thing was the start of it?

Sara saw your reaction and looked concerned, asking, "Is...something wrong? I thought you liked cyan... Well there is that frilly pink swimsuit that I'm sure would look great on you..." The very thought of wearing anything pink snapped you out of your trance violently. You hated pink with a passion. You didn't care if any of your servants had pink, or even Beverly, but nearly anything pink that by some freak of nature ended up in your room did not last long, and almost immediately found its way to the garbage upon discovery. Your mother tried to put you in a pink dress once when you were little. It was horrible. You muttered out slowly between clenched teeth, shaking in little-seen rage, "Pink? I...hate...pink...Hate it...hate it...hate it...HATE! IT!"

Sara, startled for only a moment despite having seen this beast of rage before as it appeared only very rarely, and knowing that it was really almost all bark, just dropped the subject nonchalantly with, "Ookay then. Forget I said anything."

You very quickly calmed back down. Surely an article of clothing couldn't be a harbinger of doom, right? You figured your paranoia was being caused by poking at the Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron too many times. Besides, you did absolutely love it...maybe you were destined to wear it? You apologize for your outburst and explained your reaction...sort of, with, "Sorry about that... Never liked that color. As you've just seen, you could say that pink makes me see red! He he he he...he he...he... Okay, bad joke, I know. I had a dream about this very bikini. And I mean this exact bikini. But I'm surprised that it actually exists!"

Sara, overjoyed that you liked it though a bit surprised to hear that you dreamed of a piece of clothing, (a paladin or death knight's gear certainly, but never something that would exist in real life) insisted, "Try it on! Maybe you were meant to wear it? Though honestly I would have expected you to be dreaming of taking on the Lich King solo or something like that..." You decided that it couldn't hurt and took it into the store's change room. While in there, your breasts expanded into a full...A-cup. You were surprised by this development, too surprised in fact to notice you were now 6 foot even. "Well now I know why my bra was bugging me earlier...It's about damn time puberty started...If I was going to still be flat by the time I'm twenty, I would have paid for breast augmentation. Better fake than nothing, but real ones are more than welcome!" You said while admiring yourself in the bikini of your dream. As you suspected, it fit PERFECTLY. You stepped out of the change room and gave a twirl before your best friend, asking, "Well? How do I look?"

Sara clapped her hands in approval, and said, "Almost like a goddess! And would you look at that!" pointing to your boobs. Your mind was still getting used to them despite still seeming flat next to the monsters that were Sara's pair as she continued with, "My best friend is finally getting a rack of her very own! You've still got a long way before challenging my set of twins, but I'm happy for you! In fact...I'll buy that bikini for you."

You were floored by this news. You had completely expected to get suckered into paying for Sara's haul of clothes once she found out you were loaded, and yet here she was picking up your bill. "Really?" You asked, to which Sara nodded and answered, "Yep! Consider it a belated birthday present! Stupid flu preventing me from coming to school on Friday...and it was the last day of school, too!" Best. Day. Ever! And now that your secret was out with Sara, you saw no reason why not to finally give her that sleepover. Not that you planned on making this a habit, but this was something special. You returned to the change room and decided to forgo the old bra and panties, as they no longer fit right, and put the rest of your clothes on over top of your new bikini which was much more comfortable. Once out of there, you headed for the counter and handed the inventory control tag and price tag over to the woman working the till. "I'm wearing this out of your store, and my friend is going to pay for it." You explained. The woman considered calling the manager over to see if she was allowed to do that, but since you provided the price tag for her to ring in she treated it just like any other purchase.

A lunch at the food court later, you and Sara were back out in the parking lot. You asked your friend, "Hey, do you want to finally have that sleepover tonight? Since you know my secret, and I don't want to kill you," You joked, and then continued with, "I don't see any harm in having a guest over. In fact, I think my maid, Beverly, would be happy to have a guest over! And you get a free limo drive, which you might only get to experience on prom night otherwise...and that's like a few years from now! What do you say?"

Sara was delighted at your offer, but knew that ultimately the decision was not up to her, and said, "Hang on, let me check with my mom. She drove me up here and would bite my head off if I didn't check in with her..." She walked over to a blue SUV and asked the older blonde bombshell that was her mom if she could sleep over at your place. She was standing by the door, but even she had to look up at her daughter, though from what you remembered, her dad was a giant of a man at like 6'9. The few boys that succeeded in following your friend home likely peed their pants and ran away screaming like little girls at the mere sight of him, considering he was built like a bulldozer. Finally, Sara returned with her mother's answer.
1112111.title: Twilight Zone, or your destiny?

choices: Sara's concerned about you growing like a weed.
Sara's overjoyed that you're almost as tall as her.
11121111.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

"I asked my mom if I could sleep over at your place, and...It's a... Yes!" Was Sara's answer. You were so happy you could just faint. You considered calling Beverly to let her know that you'd be having a guest over, but since dinner wouldn't be for another few hours or so, there was plenty of time for her to prepare dinner for three without being informed first. The two of you walked over to your limo and you gently tapped the driver side window to get your driver's attention, who was reading today's newspaper. He turned one eye to the source of the tapping, then calmly folded up the newspaper and unlocked the rear door for you. He was genuinely surprised to see your bombshell of a friend entering after you, and said, "I see we have an extra passenger. Does she have a name, Miss Megan?"

You nodded, and replied with, "This is Sara. She's my best friend since kindergarten, and she's coming home with us for a sleepover! Home, please, Alfred." And with that, Alfred started up the limo once the door was closed and pulled out of the parking lot, headed for your house.

Once the limo pulled in to your house, which was really a small mansion, Sara's eyes went wide. "So this place is yours, Megan? Wow..." She remarked in awe. You nodded and responded, "Yep. All mine. It's been in the family for as long as I can remember." Sara turned her head to you in complete shock, saying, "WHAT?! You live here all by yourself?!"

"Well...kind of. My mom passed away when I started preschool. Cancer. My dad took it really hard, and one day while I was in kindergarten, he had simply...left. Thankfully, Beverly has taken care of me, and I've been pretty responsible. But enough of that. I want you to enjoy yourself while you're here!" You said, as Alfred opened the door for you and Sara to exit the limo. You noticed him looking at your friend's chest for a brief moment before he shook his head in disbelief. Those monsters tended to have that effect; either they made people stop thinking with their brains, or made them ponder just how her back didn't give out supporting the twins. You reasoned her father's genes confided impressive strength even in proportion to her stature without having to look like a body builder.

Beverly was there to greet you when you came in, and was surprised by Sara's presence. "We have a guest sleeping over. Beverly, this is Sara. Sara, this is Beverly." You introduced, to which both women shook hands with each other when your maid offered. Beverly had also noticed something...different about you than this morning. Your chest sticking out farther than she remembered, sure, and she dismissed that as you wearing something better than your old undergarments. But there was something else that she couldn't quite pin down. Nevertheless, she bowed respectfully as she excused herself to prepare the guest room. And give it a much needed dusting. You spotted her putting on a face mask before she disappeared into there. "Right. That room hasn't been used for awhile..." You muttered to yourself, to which Sara giggled slightly.

As the day went on, you decided to strip down to your new bikini. It really was too nice a day not to, and you wanted to proudly show off what your best friend had bought for you today. The other new clothes were placed in your room...and subsequently ignored. Heck, you were considering returning them, this bikini felt so right for you. Once Beverly finished with the guest room, covered in dust, you showed off the bikini to her. She approved, commenting, "It looks very nice on you, Miss Megan. Now if you will excuse me, I do believe I require a bath. I trust you can manage on your own for half an hour, correct?" She winked, knowing very well that you were. You and Sara played in your pool, the latter jokingly confiding her disappointment in the lack of a pool boy to tease, to which you snorted in laughter. As the two of you goofed around in the pool all afternoon, you shrank...in your tummy, that is. The slight pudge from your belly seemed to migrate south and to the back as your butt became curvier in the same amount. As your bikini bottom still fit your body perfectly, you were none the wiser.

Dinner rolled around, and you, Sara, and Beverly ate very well. You even managed to convince Alfred to join you three at the dinner table. Sara for her part seemed surprised at how normal everything was presented, but must have reasoned that you didn't care for the fancy treatment and let it be. Despite all the (albeit minor) growing your body had done since this morning, you ate exactly the same you normally would...if not slightly less. After dinner, you played some card games instead of video games like you had originally planned to do today, and you were having a blast! By the time you and Sara were ready to call it a night at 11 PM, you tiredly saw her off to the guest room before heading into your room, and then promptly fell asleep as soon as you hit the bed, too tired to even change into your PJ's.

This was probably for the best, for they'd surely not fit you through the night. While you slept, you had a similar dream as last night's, but your body grew 3 inches, putting you now at 6'3 Your Pokeball sized breasts ballooned to B-cup, and all the while the bikini continued to fit perfectly. In the morning, Sara went into your room and woke you up giggling like a madwoman. That soon changed as you groggily got up...and up...and up. She then dragged you to the closest bathroom, to which you didn't resist as you wanted to head there anyway, and demanded that you splash your face with water. You did, and then once fully awake you stood back up...then did a double-take at what you saw in the mirror. You were only a full 2 inches shorter than Sara!
11121111.title: Sleepover is GO!

choices: Return those clothes since they're not gonna fit.
111211111.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You were shocked to see that seemingly overnight you had grown to be 6'3, but also impressed that the rest of your body seemed to gaining curves in the right places. Your friend Sara, on the other hand, was apparently worried. "Megan... You're nearly as tall as I am! Even I never grew that much overnight to get to where I am now! Are you alright? Maybe we should take you to the hospital..."

You appreciated the concern, but you only felt good. Great, even. You should be feeling achy all over, and yet you didn't. You turned to your friend, looking her effectively in the eye for the first time since...well, ever, and responded, "I am, thank you, Captain Obvious. I'm fine, Sara. In fact, I don't think I've ever felt this good. And maybe it's just a freak growth spurt and I'm done? Regardless...I don't think any doctor could tell me what's going on. Also..." You gulped, preparing to spill another secret of yours. Your friend knew this much about you, you may as well abolish this secret as well as you continued with, "I...kind of like this. Heck, if this never stops I might just love it. I've always wanted to be a giantess. There, I said it. Laughter of such weirdness in 3...2...1..."

But it never came. Naturally, Sara had no idea that this was your dream as you never told her until just now, but she smiled instead of bursting into laughter. "Really? You've always wanted to become the biggest thing out there? I suppose that you're also going to tell me you've always been secretly jealous of my walking wet dream of a figure, right?" You looked away slightly, staying awkwardly silent, which Sara noticed and said, "Wow. I-I had no idea. I guess you've always been in my shadow, even when we were kids... I liked you because you liked me, not my body exclusively. But hey, as long as whatever is happening to you isn't hurting you, and you're enjoying it, by all means. I want to see YOU gain a figure that puts ME as second-best if you were my size. At least, I'd hope to be able to see it. Would be kind of hard if you don't get there until you're practically dwarfing the solar system!" She added, and you certainly hoped you would be able to oblige your friend.

With that behind you, you and Sara head for breakfast. Beverly was quite surprised to see your new size, but kept polite about it as she asked, "Would you like extra for breakfast to go with your added size, Miss Megan?" You shook your head no and responded, "No, thank you, extra won't be necessary."

Sara raised an eyebrow to this, and asked, "You sure? You've seen how much I can pack away. You're now nearly as tall as me. Surely you're going to want more food, right?" To which you answer, "That's the thing. I don't feel like I want as much as you can scarf down. Oh that poor sap never saw it coming did he?" You giggled, remembering an eating contest that Sara had won - hands down. The loser ended up becoming close friends with a garbage can for a full minute. Sara laughed remembering her victory before you continued. "If anything...I'm not entirely sure I want as much as what I normally have. I could probably give you a run for your money, but I don't feel the need. Probably for the best too. If I get as big as Maine, for example, getting enough food would be pretty expensive... Big as Earth and beyond? Forget it. I'm not eating asteroids. I don't have to grow to eat dirt; there's plenty of it right here." You and Sara snickered at the joke.

After breakfast, you decided to tell of your dream from last night to your friend and your maid. "I had a dream last night. I was in this bikini - thanks again, Sara, by the way - and in the middle of the city. Only...this time, instead of everyone running away from me and my growth smashing everything in its path, I did...something, I'm not sure what, and people actually turned back around to see me as I outgrew the city. And nothing was harmed, either. I certainly liked that version than the previous one. Gives me hope that if or when the time comes that even the middle of the city starts to get cramped, I may not have to worry about breaking anything or killing anyone..."

Just then, you felt something. It wasn't unpleasant, but it was noticeable. Beverly and Sara watched as you grew 6 inches, putting you now at 6'9. For your part, you saw your perspective rise just a little bit. You expected your bikini to feel tight, just like your old bra and panties, but to your surprise it felt no different. "Did...did I just grow? Sara, stand up please." She complied and you stood up next to her. you could no longer look her in the eye - you were looking down at her! "Holy COW! I did just grow! Now I'm taller than y- uh-oh..." The feeling returned, and you grew another 6 inches. Your boobs swelled before Beverly and Sara's eyes to C-cup beauties, and you felt your butt become more curvy. Looking at your reflection as best as you could in the TV, you were now 7'3 and remarkably attractive. You couldn't compete with your friend's DD monsters yet, but you proportionately barely had the nicer backside. Sara had to look up considerably to look you in the face, you being 10 inches taller than her now.

"Whoa...I never thought I'd get to say this to any girl, but...Megan? How's the weather up there?" You laughed at your friend's joke, the humor not lost on you, before she pointed out, "Those clothes you bought yesterday are so gonna have to go back. But the weird thing is...that bikini shouldn't still be on you. I bought you that yesterday, before you grew into a basketball player size girl. But..." You looked down at yourself and easily noticed what she was getting at, finishing her point with, "But this bikini still fits perfectly. Like it's growing with me even as I improve in areas other than height... At least I'll be decent when I get too big to stay indoors. Not that would want to hide this body now!" You now decided to...
111211111.title: A friend's concern for a GROWING girl.

choices: Stop over at Sara's place for some changes of clothes first.
Straight to the mall to return the clothes.
1112111112.content:
...Reluctantly return the clothes you bought yesterday. They obviously weren't going to fit you now, and you suspected almost nothing ever would for very long except for your cyan bikini. But the store could use the money more than you ever could, especially once you outgrew most other human needs aside from your subscription services, and...you needed footwear to get into the mall in the first place. They didn't make exceptions for growing girls, not even ones that could look down on NBA players. And you were certain that the few pairs of shoes you did have were much too small.

"I should return them. I really should. But unless they've made an exception to the 'no shirt, no shoes, no service' policy for growing girls the size of basketball players that I haven't been informed of...I don't think I'd be getting very far. Hey, Sara? Can I borrow your shoes for a bit for this?" You said and asked. Sara shook her head and replied, "Uh-uh. Girl, you're taller than me now. By almost-" She stopped as you grew another 2 inches, now 7'5", and then continued, "Scratch that, a full foot. My shoes aren't going to fit you. And besides that, I've never seen you in high heels so I doubt you've experience walking around in them." Sara then joked, "I know I make them look easy, but they surprisingly take getting used to, and you're gonna outgrow any pair out there before you'd get the hang of something you'll eventually not need."

You nodded in slight defeat, though not upset. Still, you needed something... Beverly cleared her throat to get your attention. "If I may, Miss Megan? I might have a solution to your lack of footwear problem. Follow me." Your maid walked off towards a part of your place that you hadn't been to in some time and you followed. Beverly entered a door, but you bumped your head on the door frame, not quite used to being more than 6 feet tall. "Ow! Duck, then enter, Megan...you're not 5'6" anymore...or however the heck tall I was yesterday..." You mumbled loudly to yourself, earning both your friends snicker of amusement and her sympathy. As it was, she often had to duck a tad to be certain not to bump her head, especially when she was wearing her heels. Nevertheless, you ducked when you tried again to follow after your maid into the cellar. There, Beverly presented you with the biggest pair of sandals you had ever seen. Granted, you never had to visit any 'Big and Tall' specialty stores before, (and still wouldn't due to the whole 'keep growing and growing' thing, which sounded a lot like those Energizer battery commercials in your head) so there might have been bigger sets, but you were still impressed at their size. "These belonged to your mother." Beverly stated.

"My mom was Bigfoot? I don't remember her the greatest..." you admitted in confusion. Beverly chuckled warmly and then clarified, "Ho ho, goodness no, Miss Megan! Your mother had created these using breakthrough, cutting edge technologies. She took the details of what had went into them and how they were made to the grave with her, I'm afraid, though she had joked that one of the ingredients had been unobtainium or some variation of that term. However, I remember her telling me that these sandals would always fit a growing woman if she were to wear them, provided that they were worn regularly. She also had admitted that she had made the first pair a tad too large to be practical to anyone, though I suppose now this is no longer the case. I think that it is about time they finally found an owner that would make use of them as more than a mere curiosity, and may serve to safeguard your soles should you unavoidably step on something sharp such as an unusually pointy building."

You giggled slightly over the joke Beverly made, but you regardless still hoped to avoid stepping on buildings as much as possible. Trying the 'magic sandals' as you thought to yourself in humor on, you found them to fit quite comfortably. So far. The true test would be when your next growth spurt hit, a bigger one preferably though you hoped it would hold off until you could get your business at the mall done. But for now at least ,they would work. You thanked Beverly for them and exited to show Sara, remembering to duck and not have a repeat of what happened when you entered. "Hey, Sara! I think we've solved my footwear problem! You like?"

Your still bustier friend looked down at your feet to see the golden colored sandals that glittered with a certain magic to them. She looked at your chest, then almost immediately corrected her gaze upward to meet yours. "I feel like I'm reliving your end from yesterday at the parking lot... You ended up peering into my boobs then, and now I've gotta readjust my view to avoid peering into yours. He he, not that I mind so much. But as for those sandals, I've gotta say they're so you!" Just then, Sara's cell phone rang. Sara pulled it out to check the number, then answered when it she saw who it was. "Hang on. Hello? Hi, daddy! What? You and mom decided to head out of town for the week to celebrate your anniversary. Of course it's okay with me, dad, I'm not a little girl anymore. I can stay at Megan's until you guys come back. You could say the experience is growing on me! You two enjoy your anniversary, I insist! Okay. Bye! Looks like I'm free for the week, although these are my only set of clothes other than my swimsuit...*sniff* and I'm not even sure if they'll last me the rest of the day..."
1112111112.title: If it doesn't fit, you must...

choices: Good idea. (you just grow the expected 2 inches)
Bad idea. (you grow considerably more than 2")
Bad idea. (you grow considerably more than 2" - second option)
11121111121.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You felt for Sara's predicament, and while you felt that you should really get the clothes returned, you also wanted to let your friend get to her place so she could get some changes of clothes for herself. Not to mention that the more you thought about it...you didn't really want the money back. Nor the...'experience' of trying to explain how you grew roughly 17 inches taller at least in less than a day. You smiled inwardly as you came up with a better solution for them, keeping it to yourself for the moment, then turned your attention back to Sara.

"Well. That will never do... The lack of clothes, I mean. We'll stop over at your place so you can get some changes of clothes, and even a shower if you want, before heading over to the mall." You said. Sara however showed a bit of concern, since she was certain Alfred had never driven past her place before, mentioning, "But my place isn't along the route to the mall... Is your driver familiar with how to get there, and is he-" You saw where her concerns were going and cut her off with, "He's going to have to learn how to get there about a week from now to take you back to your place anyway. Alfred may as well learn the way now. That, however, does mean you'll need to give him the directions on how to get there."

And with the matter settled, you headed for your room to collect the clothes for returning. As you did, you mused that it wouldn't be long before you would become too big to fit in your room. A temporary bed would need to be set up in another location until even that would wind up being insufficient. But you grabbed the bag that had been all but forgotten about yesterday and headed out. Alfred had quite the shock when he saw the 7'5" you requesting a ride along with Sara, but seemed to at least try to keep a level of professionalism about the matter.

"To Sara's place, please. She'll provide you with the location and directions if you like." you ordered in the same kind manner you usually did, to which Alfred replied, "V-very well, Miss Megan." At that, you were off to Sara's place, with her providing the necessary directions to get to her place. The ride wasn't as comfortable for you as it normally was, but then you had to sit a bit awkwardly to avoid having your head bump into the roof.

Still, Alfred pulled the limo up to the driveway of Sara's place before you knew it, and she got out to head inside. While waiting for her, you told Alfred where you wanted to head next once Sara came back, and he nodded in confirmation. After about half an hour, you started to feel that sensation from earlier, and while it might have yielded another 2 inches, you made an effort to hold it in for now. You liked growing bigger, that much was true...but not at the expense of further discomfort. When Sara finally returned, she noticed your focus. "I'm back! Something wrong, Megan?"

When she let herself into the limo, you answered as you gave the nod for Alfred to go, "No, just trying to hold my growth in for now. I'll let myself get as big as a Feraligatr after we come back from the mall. If I think of it like holding in the need to pee, it's really not so hard." Sara took your word for it and watched the scenery go by the window. It became pretty clear to her though soon enough that the limo wasn't heading for the mall... "Uh, where are we going? This isn't the way to the mall?" You smiled and informed her, "You're right. And that's because I've decided I'm not going to return these after all. The store can use the money more than I can, and the Salvation Army can always use donations. Don't worry, I still intend to go to the mall for some food."

Once at the donation drop off, you briefly exited and deposited the clothes in the hope that another would get use out of them then reentered and had Alfred take you and Sara to the mall. A spot closer to the entrance this time, much to his surprise. You and your friend entered, knowing that the time for hiding was behind you. As you walked to the food court, you got a lot of stares from people who would have ignored you before. You loved it, but still kept your growth held in despite it getting increasingly harder to do so. You treated Sara to lunch, and you both effectively ate like queens on junk food, finishing up with a large McFlurry each. And while a bikini and sandals might have been questionable wear for a mall, security seemed unsurprisingly lax about the matter. Regardless, you felt that it was a good idea to head home while you could still hold the growth in. More for the ride home than the people in the mall. You and Sara made your way back out, sadly still without poking into GameStop, and had Alfred drive you back to your place.

Almost as soon as you returned, you immediately opened the door and got out, running out back to your backyard at a speed you'd swear would give Sonic a run for his money. Sara followed, though more out of concern. When she got there, she asked you, "What's the hurry? Is it something I did?" You looked to her and answered, "No, it's my growth. I can't hold it in any longer! Thing is...I'm not sure if my holding it in was a good idea...or a bad one."
11121111121.title: Helping those in need. And lunch.

111211111212.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You warned Sara to stay back as you finally released your hold on your growth. The feeling was almost indescribably pleasurable, like finally letting yourself go to the bathroom after holding it in for hours. You grew the expected 2 inches...and exceeded that expectation as you passed 8 feet without sign of slowing down. You maintained enough self-control to not masturbate in front of your friend, though you'd have no such restraint if you believed yourself alone. Your breasts grew again, now proportionately even bigger than Sara's own monsters, putting them at about E-cup. Your butt filled out more, now unquestioningly putting Sara's to shame. All the while you surpassed 9 and even 10 feet in height. You kept growing until at last the sensation subsided. You slowly stood upright and found yourself at an amazing 15'5" tall - a whole 9 feet taller than your friend. Impressively, the sandals had kept up with your feet the whole time, and still fit perfectly just like your cyan bikini.

"Okay. So holding the growth in. Bad idea. Just makes me grow even more once I stop. Good to know..." You uttered in sarcasm. Looking at your body from all possible angles, you giggled as you came to a realization, announcing, "Hey Sara! I do believe I have done it! I've officially put your body to shame! ...Granted, a chest this big is gonna take some getting used to." Sara turned her stupor into a beaming expression at the news. "Holy cow, Megan, you're right! I'd bet that if they saw you coming, the boys would be too busy drooling over the sight of a smoking-hot giantess to even think to run!" You respond with, "You got that right, short stuff!" and both you and Sara laugh at the joke.

Sara headed inside to put her changes of clothes away while you pondered on how to get inside your own house...or if you even should try. You were too big for your bedroom now, and you'd be lucky if you could squeeze through any of the doors inside. You'd also likely crush any chair you tried to sit on as they were never meant for 15'5" tall girls to sit in. And you'd probably bump your head on some of the ceilings inside... Plus, what would happen when you grew again? The problems would be compounded, and you might not even be able to get out, forcing you to wait until you had no choice but to break your way out with your growth. Ultimately, you decided that it was best to stay outdoors. That way you could continue to enjoy the growth without putting anyone inside your home at risk.

The fortunate thing you found was that even in the 90 degree heat you didn't feel unbearably hot or sweaty. Sure, it felt a little warm, but not so much that you were sweating like a pig. You figured you wouldn't feel cold that much either, not that you planned to go skinny-dipping in Antarctica anytime soon. The Sun's rays also seemed to bother your eyes less, even compared to a normal person who didn't spend much of their time behind a monitor. And on that note, the unfortunate thing that hit you hard was the fact your fingers were much too large to play any of your games. You were starting to see why many giantesses were depicted as going crazy when they grew big...being cut off from their favorite things due to their size, you theorized it was possible that sheer boredom may have driven some over the edge. Of course, this was entirely just your opinion, and was subject to bias.

Nevertheless, you resolved not to go down that path. Sara and Beverly, the latter nearly having a heart attack when she saw how big you had grown currently, made things easier by keeping you company and offering meals through the afternoon. But despite your size, you maintained the same amount you ate before becoming so big...though you couldn't help but eat the orange whole as it was much too small to pull the sections apart. And a peach including the pit for similar reasons, though you fortunately didn't feel sick after eating the part of the fruit poisonous to people.

"You guys mean a lot to me. You know that, right?" you tell them. Suddenly, you felt that feeling return. "What? Again? I take it back. Holding in my growth wasn't a bad idea; it was a stupid idea." You back up a bit, as you were uncertain if this would be a small spurt...or another big one.
111211111212.title: Bad idea.

1112111112122.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

Once you back up a bit, you felt the feeling become more euphoric, which likely meant this was going to be another big spurt. Thankfully not as pleasurable as the last one, so maybe not so big, but then the last one had been held back. Maybe this meant it was going to be an even larger spurt than you initially thought? Either way, you resolved to not try to hold it back as that made matters worse. Instead, you inwardly pleaded with yourself to not destroy your property - or worse, hurt your friends.

"Ready or not, here I grow..." you said as you witnessed your view creep higher and higher, faster and faster. You sat on your hands to ensure they wouldn't work themselves into someplace embarrassing. You grew past the 20 foot mark and didn't seem to be slowing down so you assumed you had a ways to go yet before this was done. Thoughts crept into your head, things like why should I care about what they think of me? I could crush them all if I so chose... Said thoughts were immediately countered with ones like, what am I thinking?! Of course I should care! They're my friends! I refuse to let them - no, anyone or anything be harmed by me! And if you don't like it, voice in my head, then so help me...

"U-uh, Megan?" you heard Sara say to you, which snapped you out of your thoughts. You looked down and found you had to be at least 30 feet now and still going. Thankfully your bikini and sandals were keeping up, but from what you could discern from your friend's face...she was scared of you. You reply back, hesitantly, "What?" as you passed 35 feet. She said, "Y-you're kind of big... You...you're not planning on, y'know, squashing us all flat or eating us, are you?"

40 feet passed, then things slowed down finally at 45. At last, everything subsided when you hit 50 feet in height. You brought your foot up over your friend...and then bring it down almost right next her gently as you prepared to stand up. Whatever dark influence tried to sway you to the side of evil and destruction seemed to have been vanquished. Maybe that was what separated the gentle giantesses from the evil ones; succumbing or refusing to bow to that thought of destruction. "Once you head down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. And you get dental." you said, which did little to comfort Sara once you stood to your full height. You stretched, noted the view, almost as if pondering to go into the city to rampage...but finally knelt down in front of Sara and Beverly's scared forms and smiled, saying, "Guess I'm not getting that dental, then. Though Attack of the 50 Foot Gentle Teen doesn't quite have the same ring to it... Bah, Beverly, tell them to drop the 'Attack of' part for me, will you? My hands are just a bit too big for the phone!"

Both women breathed a heavy sigh of relief when your joking reassured them that you were still yourself, and hadn't let the power corrupt you. You explained, "Actually, guys...I have to admit something. For a few moments back there...I felt tempted to go bad. Like I could crush you all if I chose and stuff. But I fought back on that. Because no matter what happens to me...you're still my friends. I refuse to let anyone or anything be harmed by me. Maybe...maybe that's the difference between the dreams of what I did. The first one had me be overwhelmed by the growth and everything got destroyed. The second one I refused to let anything be harmed and nothing was."

Beverly was the first to speak after this with, "Miss Megan, surely these dreams have little meaning. Surely they're just dreams..." You nodded in admittance. True, little of what was in the dreams played out in real life. But still...you felt as though there was more to them than just being dreams. "Maybe. But then again, the morning after the first dream, I get pushed to go out shopping. Sara was coincidentally in the right place to see me getting out of the limo, and very coincidentally led me to the very same bikini in my dream. Which, also very coincidentally, happened to fit me perfectly and is somehow growing with me to stay that way. Then this morning after the second dream, I find myself in dire need of footwear, and almost too coincidentally, you provide me with a pair of sandals that just so happen to be able to grow with me and were big enough to fit me at that moment.

"I don't know about you guys, but that seems to be an awful lot of convenient coincidences in that turn of events. I could buy one or two of these as that, but all of them? Yeah, I'm not buying it as coincidence. So on that note...I've got something I want to test out." you said, and then found the perfect test subjects: two trees of similar height yet still were taller than you. One was beautiful and lively; the other was gnarled and hadn't been removed yet. You got up and walked to the gnarled tree. "3...2...1... Goodbye, ya old hunk of wood!" you punched straight through its trunk with little resistance on one side near the base and the tree fell. with you catching it and setting it down on the ground gently. "Now, watch the other one. Note how its trunk is slimmer, more delicate. I surely should be able to break it even easier than the other one." you walked the few steps (for you) to the lively tree. "3...2...1... FALCON PUNCH!" you punched the tree in the same spot with all of your enhanced strength, with the only result being a loud thud when your fist made contact. You smiled. "Did you see that? ...Exactly. Nothing can be wrecked by me unless I will myself to break it, and only that. With this, who knows? Maybe I can head into the city and help with demolition projects or something that can put my growing size to good use while I'm here. Or at the very least, not worry about hurting anyone when I wander about and continue to grow. I can't stay still, I'd go crazy for sure."

Sara suggested, "Oh! I know what we could do...Davis!" Beverly looked at her quizzically, before you explained, "He's a boy in school. Another close friend of mine." Sara nodded, and then continued, "You and I go to his place and show him the new you! Yeah, it'll scare the pants off him at first, but he'll understand. And as a boy, he may be too busy drooling over a smoking-hot giantess to be scared." you giggled, and decided whether or not to go with your friend's suggestion.
1112111112122.title: Attack of the 50 Foot...Gentle Teen?

choices: Wait for Davis to come to naturally.
11121111121221.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You settled on your decision. You were done hiding who you were...that, and you were too hot and big (and would be getting even bigger) to keep yourself hidden forever. Plus as your friend, and in another life potentially something more, Davis deserved to know what was happening. So you agreed with Sara's suggestion to go visit him. Your first trip into the city as a full-fledged giantess somehow got you excited and dreading at the same time. Military firepower might still be able to hurt you, and the Army wasn't exactly known for asking questions first before leaving a 'threat' little more than a smoking crater even if you tried to make it clear you were (mostly) harmless.

But it also hit you that Sara wanted to come along as well. She could take your limo, with you instructing Alfred to drive her to where she wanted to go like he would do normally with you, but it might not be able to keep up with you now. That, and Alfred was probably still recovering from the shock of you growing to 50 feet tall in an afternoon. You didn't want to stress him even if his services wouldn't be required by you again. He still felt like family to you. So you would have to leave Sara behind. Or...

"Ever had a ride with a 50 foot tall girl before, Sara? Nice view, very accommodating...ride itself might not be the smoothest, but I'll try. And besides that, I'd like to let Alfred recover from the shock, so the limo is kinda out of the question right now..." you asked, knowing full well she hadn't because no such thing existed until now. Sara got the hint and replied, "No, but I suppose I can add it and scratch it off my bucket list. I assume we're going to Davis' place in the city, then?" You nodded and answered, "Yep, that's the plan. Also figure people are gonna have to get used to a growing giantess in the neighborhood at some point, may as well let them see I'm perfectly harmless now than when I could use a skyscraper for a...toothpick. Yes, toothpick. Certainly not what most giant women would love to imagine using such a tall, thin object for, honest!"

Sara giggled with the knowledge of what you meant, and stepped into your waiting hand. You slowly and gently lifted her to your shoulder which was plenty big enough for her to sit on. The warmth of another person's flesh against your own was surprisingly pleasant as Sara's legs hung down over your shoulder. Slowly you stood up to your full height and began the journey to Davis' place. Thankfully, the fences weren't that high and you had no trouble stepping over them without fear of tripping. It still amazed you how your friend seemed to be effectively the size of a Barbie doll to you, though she obviously had curves Ken would dump Barbie in a heartbeat for if the dolls were real like Sara.

Nevertheless, you played it careful with Sara. You didn't want her ride to be uncomfortable and you certainly didn't want to risk her life in case your protection didn't cover accidentally falling off of you. Part way there, you felt the sensation return once more but only slightly. Thus it was just a small spurt this time...granted, 3 feet was small for you now. You knew Sara had felt you grow beneath her, and you turned your head to check on her. Thankfully, she was taking this riding a girl just over 10 times her original size in stride.

As you entered the city, you attempted to keep at least one lane of traffic unblocked by your feet and sandals while also trying to give people plenty of room to not get stepped on or kicked like action figures. Unlike in New Super Mario Bros, destroying things when huge wouldn't net extra 1-Ups. There was one point where a few muggers were about to stab a person. You stepped in by putting your hand in the way. You bled just a little as the knives weren't long enough to leave any really deep cuts and the cuts themselves seemed to heal noticeably quick. "No. You lowlife scum had better start running to the nearest police station to turn yourselves in and rethink your lives before I fling you there myself like an Angry Bird at a pig. You'll survive it, I'm sure, but bones will be breaking." The muggers, obviously no long having clean underwear at the sight of you, decide wisely not to tempt fate. Checking with the almost-victim and finding he was okay, even thankful for your save, you move on to Davis place.

Once there, you with the greatest of dexterity, pick up a small rock and throw it at his window lightly The rock's impact makes quite the resounding thump but left the window completely unscathed otherwise. Letting Sara down, you hide out of sight until it was time. And soon enough, Davis poked his head out to find out what was causing the racket and said, "Wha? Sara? B-but what do you want?" You heard Sara reply back to the jet black haired boy of hazel eyes, "You. Out here. Now."

In a minute the you heard Davis' door open with a squeak followed by a light rustling as he walked out to meet Sara. From your vantage point, you saw that his eye level was at her boobs then strained to look up higher at her face. You heard him say, "Uh, it's not like I'm not glad to see you here, Sara, but I still don't know what you want from me." She said in return, "It's about Megan. She wants you to let you in on some things! And to see the new her." Davis sounded naturally a little suspicious as he replied, "Okay...but if it's just a new geek shirt or a change of hair color you've conned her into I'm going back inside-" he stopped as you gently stomped the ground mischievously, "What was that?" you heard him ask, to which Sara cheerfully answered, "Why Megan, of course! Come on out!"

You stood up and walked out into view, easily taller than the nearby maple tree and with the figure that put Sara's to shame. With a smile you said to Davis, "Hi! Did Sara mention that she's no longer the sexiest thing on two legs hailing from our school? For shame, girl. You'd think a boy would be interested to know!" Sara slyly shrugged her shoulders in an 'oh well' manner. Davis for his part had fainted...or swooned. It was somewhat hard to tell.
11121111121221.title: Go see Davis.

111211111212211.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You were tempted to poke him awake gently, but ultimately you felt it best for Davis to come to on his own. After all, he might react poorly to a 53 foot tall girl poking him no matter how gentle you'd be. A slight rumble was heard as your body grew to 57 feet in height, more than large enough to use Davis for...fun. Tempting a thought as it was, you didn't think he'd agree with being a human dildo and so left him alone. Not to mention wanting to stay gentle.

Eventually, you watched as Davis began to stir. Sara had grabbed a nearby fallen tree branch and was she motioning to make it look like she was about to poke him with it. You stifled a giggle as the boy opened his eyes towards Sara and said, "What a weird dream...Hey! Put the stick down! I ain't dead yet!" Sara dropped it and sat down as he continued, "I dreamed something about Megan being huge and - wait. It's like 5:30 in the afternoon...why is it so dark out all of the sudden?"

You answered his question, forcing him to look up. And up. "Because it wasn't a dream, dummy. You're in the shadow of the girl you've been friends with for years now. Only now I'm nearing 60 feet tall and have a scorching-hot body. And in a lovely bikini that's mysteriously growing with me. Better than nothing but my birthday suit. Gotta think of the children, after all."

Davis managed to get up the courage to ask, "S-so does that mean you're...you're about to..." And you finished, "...kill you? Eat you? Use you as a sex toy? ...I admit, the last one sounds fun, but no. I'm a little disgruntled right now because I can't play WoW, but..." Davis interrupted by asking, "WoW? As in, World of Warcraft? ...So it was you who sicked that Death Knight on me in PvP! Meganite the Relentless! ...How long have you been playing it for?!"

"Um...Since just before Wrath of the Lich King." you replied nonchalantly, which made Davis' jaw drop. "Are you made of money or something?! It's a wonder how I can manage to keep up with the fee..." he questioned, and you answered. "...Well...yeah. And as of right now, you and Sara are the only ones who know that I'm secretly wealthy."

"She lives in a small mansion and has a limo and a very friendly maid, Davis...although near a small mansion would be more appropriate now, I guess. I'm even staying over at her place for the week!" Sara exclaimed and you smiled. If this was the kind of reception you were going to get by telling about your secret fortune...you should have revealed it sooner! At any rate, you brought the subject back to what you were going to say before you were interrupted. "I refuse to let anyone or anything be harmed by me. In the 7 years you've known me, have you ever known me to get well and truly violent? Especially towards friends? You haven't because I wouldn't want to harm anyone. And that hasn't changed despite it being more than in my power to do so. I'm still the same Megan you've always known. Do you believe me, Davis?"

The answer was immediate, almost seemingly as if by instinct. "I believe you wholeheartedly, Megan. I'm sure you had your reasons for keeping your secret from me and Sara before now, but I'm glad that there's no more secrets between friends. ...Is there? Anyway, it's nice to know that I won't be squashed flat beneath your monumental butt because you slip and trip on a tanker truck." You giggled at the joke and replied, "Hey, if they leave a perfectly good tanker truck in a place someone's going to trip over it, I'm not taking responsibility for what ensues. Just fair warning that ears will need covering and sailors may be blushing. I will say that I've kinda always dreamed of growing into a friendly giantess. I'm still growing, by the way, Davis. I don't know when or even if I'll ever stop. I've also lived alone for much of my life, aside from my maid, Beverly, and Alfred my limo driver. Before you go fantasizing about her...Beverly is nearly 40."

You then asked, "That said...would you like to visit my place? You'd hardly weigh much of anything to me now, so it's no trouble to carry you and Sara. And really, I'd like to try and make it up to you over the stuff I never mentioned while I still can."
111211111212211.title: Wait for Davis to come to naturally.

choices: You, Sara, and Davis make it home trouble free.
A problem arises on the way back, and it's not your growing.
1112111112122111.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You awaited Davis' answer patiently. But after a few minutes, it seemed as though his answer was clear as he headed back inside and closed the door wordlessly. With a heavy heart, you let Sara walk onto your hand and turn around to head back. You didn't like Davis' apparent decision to not go with you, fearing that perhaps he didn't mean anything that he said and that your friendship was over, but the least you could do was respect it. You wouldn't force anyone to do anything unless they were bad and needed the nudge of a giantess to rethink their lives such as those muggers from earlier. And Davis was not a bad person in the slightest in your opinion.

However, you barely took two steps away before you heard a familiar voice call out, "WAIT!!! IN THE NAME OF BRONZEBEARD, WAIT, YOU GINORMOUS WOMAN!!!" you turned around, as clearly there were no others around that could possibly fit the description of 'ginormous woman', (and calling out the name of Bronzebeard as it was his Level 80 Dwarf you beat to a pulp with your Death Knight. He started the duel, however) and watched as Davis came running toward you as fast as his legs would allow. At about 5'8", he wasn't short, nor was he overweight. In fact, he was generally a bit on the lanky side but a good runner. It was just you were pretty much ten times bigger than him.

You said with surprise, "Davis? I-I thought you didn't want to come!" Davis finally caught up to you and leaned against your leg to catch his breath. Your ankle alone was well over half his height, and his touch still felt as warm and pleasant as Sara's flesh did on you. You were going to miss the feeling of fellow human physical contact when it came time to say goodbye to Earth, maybe sooner than that. Of course, you had no idea if you were going to outgrow the planet yet, but it didn't stop you from cherishing the small things in case you would be able no longer later.

"Yeah, well, you thought wrong. Needed to check with my folks and grab some spare clothes just in case. Surprisingly, my folks are okay with me going out with Queen Kong to visit her place. Their words, not mine, so don't shove me in the ground for it." you smiled and giggled, making your breasts jiggle a bit and attracting the boy's attention like bugs to a bug zapper. You loved them so for that. Of course, being likened to a big gorilla wasn't so fun but what could you do? Aside from stomp him and his folks flatter than pancakes, you weren't going to do that. Instead, you bent down, giving Davis possibly the best view he's ever had...until you grew again considerably, anyway, and offered your hand for him to step onto. He accepted and you brought him up to your other shoulder since you weren't sure if one shoulder could comfortably support two people yet...and you weren't sure if he and Sara should be left together on such a narrow space. He might get touchy with her, she might decide to 'accidentally' shove him off, and he might end up in a place on you he'd enjoy far too much. Better to be safe than sorry.

"Nah, I think I'll leave that to Sara. At least with her you have a chance of getting back out in the same country. If it were me...how's your Chinese? You might be needing it to catch the plane home." You joke as you head off back for home with your friends in tow. Thinking about having two 'little' people on your shoulders, you say with a giggle, "Now, if either of you start trying to suggest me to do nice things or bad things, I'm flicking you both off and you'll be walking the rest of the way. Are we clear? I'm kidding, I'm kidding!"

A familiar rumbling sound was heard, and Davis said, worried, "...W-what's that sound? And why are you shaking slightly?" You answered, "You know how I said I was still growing earlier? That's what this is all about; I'm about to grow again. No worries, it's not a big one, and even if it was you and Sara are perfectly safe on me. I'd never let anything bad happen to my friends. Well, except for getting dumped. Flesh, bone, and sinew I can keep unbroken. Matters of the heart? You're on your own though you can still rest easy knowing you've got me cheering in your corner." And indeed, you grew. 7 feet later, bringing your height in feet to the familiar number of 64. (you had an old N64 kicking around somewhere. A little before your time, but sometimes fun games weren't always the latest and greatest but older classics) You felt like cracking a joke about it, but decided against it. Both your friends have probably suffered enough of your idea of humor to last them for awhile yet.

The trip back was even quicker now, considering you were 11-14 feet taller than when you had set out. A police car stopped you one the way by calling for you to halt, and you did. Fortunately, you weren't in trouble. Rather, the officer wanted to congratulate you for stopping a potential murder. You thanked him and asked if that's all, to which he said that it was and you were free to go on your way. Not that the police had much of any power to stop you, but you were still a law-abiding citizen even if you were a giantess now. Regardless, you wish him a nice day.

"That officer seemed to be awfully familiar with you. Why?" Davis asks. You answer without turning your attention from your path, (in case a car or person is unfortunate enough to be crossing paths, you wanted to be able to avoid stepping down on them) "I've never been in trouble with the law, if that's what you're thinking. I've made a few donations here and there. I admit I'm probably one of, if not THE richest people in the city alone. I've got stock in several local companies and earn some of their shares, but unless it's failing miserably I prefer to let the CEO's handle their own companies rather than mess with what's working."

If not for me, it'd have been torn down years ago. But since the superintendent and maybe the principal are the only ones aware of it, the teachers have all treated me the same as anyone else - just the way I want it. Anyway, we're here! ...It seems smaller than I remember - oh. Right. Heh."

Sara groaned slightly at your funny as you arrived back at your place. Davis, on the other hand, was too busy trying to get his jaw off the ground even from your shoulder's height. You guessed if this was your first time seeing the small mansion that was your place, you'd have that reaction too. Beverly was already out to greet you, and even Alfred was out as well helping in whatever way he could since you obviously would have little need for his services as a limo driver. Once you gently let your friends down onto the ground, (you could probably simply drop them and they'd be fine, but that would be mean regardless) you said, "Nice to see you up and around, Alfred. But...what convinced you to stay?" Alfred turned to face you, still a tad unnerved at your sheer size but seemingly trying to get used to it, and replied, "Beverly did. She told me that despite your ever increasing size, your personality hadn't changed and that you would be saddened to see me leave. So I've decided to at least attempt to help wherever I can here. Forgive me if I'm not as proficient as dear Beverly...I am new at this."

You smiled and then responded, "Not a problem. I'm just glad she was able to convince you." you then introduced Davis to your maid and (somewhat former) limo driver. "Alfred, Beverly, this is Davis. If you could prepare a place for him to stay, I'd appreciate it. I'd do it myself, but I'm obviously not going to fit through the doors." Both nodded courteously, and Beverly led him inside to where he would be sleeping. Obviously not your old room as you didn't want him doing you didn't even want to think about what with your old clothes, or worse your games.

That night, everyone slept. That is, except for yourself. You weren't sure why, just you didn't feel tired. Strangely, and much to your relief, you've noticed that you haven't felt the need to go to the bathroom at all today since you hit double-digit numbers of feet in height, if even then. You have stumbled across pictures of giantesses...unloading their bowels on unsuspecting cities before, and you...definitely had no desire to be mimicking those pictures in real life.

After about midnight, a familiar sensation began bubbling up again. Seeing as how your hand was all but magnetically drawn to its favorite spot in your crotch, and it took as much willpower as you could muster to keep it out of there, this was going to be big. You get up and move well back of your home as a precaution just in time as your body starts to grow at a frenzied pace. 70 feet soon becomes 80 and then 90 feet, and still your body grew bigger and bigger. "Welcome to the world of triple-digit height in feet, Megan..." you muttered quietly as your body did just that at 110 feet and climbing. Your breasts alone looked like they were the size of larger houses as you reached 140 feet and still growing strong. Just when you thought it wouldn't end, your body slows and stops - at an impressive 200 feet tall, over triple your previous height! You weren't shocked anymore...you were amazed.

You closed your eyes and tried to sleep now. Not because you were tired, just you wanted to try and keep some level of normality. In the morning, you awoke to someone poking your breast, hearing Davis as he said, "Bloody hell...and I thought she was huge before..." You opened your eyes just a sliver and focused on him as he continued to poke your boob.

You...hadn't really thought about it, to be honest. You shrugged your huge shoulders and said, "I dunno. Were you expecting giant flesh colored stone or something? Honestly, I'm surprised at the things I can feel and do now. I'm able to not break anything or harm anyone by accident. I don't think I need food anymore outside of the comfort it gives from the act of eating. I've been injured, and have healed very quickly. And I can still feel things that I probably shouldn't. Like your poking me. You aren't even 2 inched compared to me and I still felt you."

Sara came over and asked, "Aren't you a little scared of all this, Megan? I mean, you've said before you enjoy being bigger, but...I don't think these things are normal for someone your size..."

You were about to answer when you felt the sensation return. You grew quickly, and then stopped at 235 feet tall. Finally, you said, "Well that was quick... Anyway, I'm not actually scared of this to be honest. It's incredibly convenient. But...I have a feeling that I'm not just becoming a giantess here, but something...more." before you can elaborate, the sensation hits again and you reach 290 feet tall. "That wasn't an indication for you to grow bigger just then, body!" you shouted half-jokingly.

"Strange powers, uncontrollable growth, and you don't even blow out our eardrums when you shout? Oh no...I have a bad feeling about what you're going to say..." Davis remarked with almost dread. A dread which you didn't exactly understand. It wasn't like you were going to unleash the Burning Legion or the Scourge on him...or the Zerg for that matter.

"Yeah, I think I'm well past oddly giant girl here. I'm...entering goddess-hood. Guess I just don't have the really fun powers that go with the title yet... Oh well." you elaborated finally and noted the reactions of your friends. They seemed to be alarmed to some extent, like they were afraid you were going to let that go to your already massive head.

"A g-goddess? But they don't exist...do they?" Sara remarked.

"Well if they didn't before, one does now. Don't worry, I'm not letting this go to my head or anything. But hey, how many people can say they're BFF's with a goddess in the making? Just...don't start worshiping me. I really don't need the ego boost." you said with a wink. And then... "...Again? That's three this morning! I'd hold you down, but that's about as smart as lemmings walking off a ledge to their certain demise..." You grew again, clearing 300 feet, then 320 feet. Just as you were about to slow down, your body sped up again and cleared 350 feet. 370 feet of height came and passed soon after. Finally, your body halted at 450 feet tall. Even Sara's 6'5" bombshell of a body didn't even seem like an inch tall to you.

"Scratch that, four just this morning. Oh if only I could manipulate reality right now... I could really use to play some WoW right about now..." you confess, unsure if this was all for the morning, or if there was all prelude to a big one.

You wait patiently for the three to be seated before you even think to begin – with what you have to reveal, they're going to want the seat.

"Okay, so you're a giant goddess now. What do you have to explain to us here?" Sara asks, her blue eyes looking at you inquisitively.

"That's just it. I have always been a goddess, but it's only just recently that my powers have begun to fully awaken. I've been oblivious to my true nature for... I don't even know how many lifetimes now. I also realize I'm behind some of the things leading up to this," you answer. 114111212.title: Big Friend Jess

choices: "Life at the university research lab is..."
