1141112122.content:
"Well... maybe a little..."

The words leave your mouth before you can really arrange your thoughts. Honestly, it's not the worst thing you could have said, all things in consideration.

But it really has impressed upon you the sheer scale your best friend has suddenly grown, within 15 minutes, no less, and even without her knowledge of the change. Her feet, longer than a city bus or train car. Her toes, nearly as tall as you are. Her ankle, well out of reach without climbing a couple stories. To say nothing of the immense height of her knees, or hips, or... the rest of her. It's awe-inspiring... and honestly rather intimidating at this angle, as she's surmised.

And what's even odder and somewhat more distressing is how she continues to accept that her life has always continued naturally up to this point, even as she soars over 500 feet in height, as if such growth has been naturally part of her life until now. And not just that; her clothes have grown with her (to some degree) every step of the way, meaning that you are retroactively causing all of reality, or at least everything pertaining directly to her, to reshape itself to fit her new greater stature every time you pay her the slightest compliment. After all, if she remembers her growth every step of the way and still retains fitting clothing, then the world at large has to be supplying those over-sized garments... right?

You wince. And even at that, the larger she grows, the less capable the manufacturing capabilities of humanity will be at maintaining her dignity. After all, how do you adequately manufacture a set of underwear for a teenage girl who's hundreds of feet tall? Her top and panties, which you belatedly realize have shrunk slightly in terms of coverage through all her growth spurts, almost resemble repurposed hot air balloons or other heavy duty fabrics, not the soft cotton garments worn by your teen of average height and build.

And what of the rest of her daily life, you ponder with growing horror. How can Jess, a young woman nearly 100 times a normal girl's height, maintain a regular life in high school? What kind of life might she be leading now, after all, especially if the world has been adjusting to her growth spurts as if they've been completely natural? Certainly the government or some other agency would have stepped in to monitor and regulate the situation as she grew year after year. The magnitude of her comments, about receiving very few compliments, weighs even heavier on your heart as the full impact of your reckless complimentary growth bears down on you. If so few people have anything nice at all to say about her, regardless of her looks and personality, then what kind of life must she be leading now? How will you live with yourself if you have ruined your best friend's life just to selfishly see her bloom into a towering giantess?

Jess's eyes squint slightly, a wave of pain crossing her face as your response hits home. Damn it, there are fractions of a second here to salvage the spirit of your best friend, and you haven't a moment to spare!

"BUT!!" you yell out, startling your enormous friend. "But," you continue in a normal voice, "it's because..." Come on... come on... how to help her feel better... what did she say earlier...? "It's because you always like holding me... right?" Some hazy memories start to mingle with yours... You shudder for a moment. Are you even restructuring your own memories by the compliments and growth that you're spurring along? How on Earth are you going to hold onto your own sanity, and keep track of what all you've done, if you keep re-writing your own history such that you forget it?!

You take a deep breath, closing your eyes and concentrating.

Not quite. Not a complete re-write; you can still remember everything as it happened before, but your memories seem like they're doubled, as if you've lived both your original life and the most recent life you've apparently lived with your now 500 foot tall friend. Opening your eyes, trying to project the most earnest expression at her own confused orbs, you continue, "You've always tried to protect me, haven't you. Tried to always talk with me face to face; tried to keep me from seeing you like..." You take a deep breath. "Like everyone else sees you."

Jess shudders, her eyes widening, her entire posture going rigid. She begins stammering, horror obviously gripping her heart.

God, you're an absolute heel for making her feel this way! Frantically, you wave your arms, before staggering toward her nearest toe. "But I don't! It just surprised me, is all! I mean, I haven't seen you like this since you were like... I dunno, only 60 feet tall or so! I guess I just wasn't ready!" You smile, patting the large toe on her left foot. "But it's okay! You're still you, right, Jess? I mean, I don't have anything to fear from you! I still trust you! You're my best friend in the world!"

She freezes, staring at you with those wide surprised eyes... then shoots up another hundred feet. Tears collect in her eyes, and for one long stretch of silence, you fear you may have said the wrong thing...

And then she smiles.

You stare at her for a moment, breathing heavily yourself, before grinning up at your colossal friend. She smiles even wider, closing her eyes even as tears continue to pour from them, before she buries her face in her hands. Her shuddering sobs, thankfully sounding more like relief than sadness, thunder down from above, and she eventually collapses to her knees which impact the ground like mortar shells behind you.

You give her a few minutes, taking the time to walk out of her shadow toward her knees so she can more easily see you. After she sniffles one last time, seemingly pulling her spirit back together, you glance back up to her tear-streaked but smiling face.

"Thank you," she whispers, her voice still pounding and surrounding you like a force of nature. She opens her mouth to continue, but catches herself, shakes her head, then reaches down to delicately surround your body with fingers as thick as you are. You leap into that huge woven net of giantess digits and power through the stomach churning ride up to her multi-story-sized head. "I knew I could count on you," Jess whispers, her eyes twinkling, before pressing you against pursed lips taller than you are.

"Think nothing of it," you manage, squeezing her lips as much as you can to return your own affection.

After a long moment, she pulls you back, looking far better composed and happy... and curiously flushed. Are her eyes sparkling a bit more than the last time...?

You shake those thoughts from your mind, even as new freshly created ones surge into their place. Trying to keep the conversation rolling, and also trying to dodge some awkward feelings coursing through your veins, you ask, "So, how've you been doing? Haven't gotten to hang out with you lately..."
1141112122.title: Some Harsh Realities

choices: "Yeah, pretty normal, as close as I can figure it."
"To be honest... I really hate it here."
11411121221.content:
Jess shrugs, incidentally raising you an additional dozen feet in the air, before responding, "Well, they keep thinking they're about to come across a new breakthrough at the university. So they've kept me in testing for the past few months. They think it won't be long before they figure out what's causing me to... um, grow... so abnormally." A pink blush covers her face and neck, and you valiantly retain all efforts to admit how fetching and lovely she looks in that color. At least for the time being, you're trying to rein in that desire to make her grow, regardless how excited it makes you feel.

She slowly shakes her head. "I don't think they're getting any closer, but I've never been that good at science..." She grins sheepishly.

You chuckle in response. "My grades were never that good either, though I've always wondered about your growth spurts. I guess you're at the university because of your parents?" Those double memories continue to feed you new information about this alternate giantess-Jess world you've created with your compliments, and you figure that asking questions and making comments that help flesh out this new world will help you cope with it better.

Aside from the whole "any nice thing I say about my best friend will make her grow another few dozen feet" issue. You're not entirely sure how you're going to address this in the future, to be honest, without understanding your current circumstances. Hence the indirect interrogation.

Jess nods. "Yeah, since my dad teaches biology at the university, I think he got me set up with some research at his school before the government could really get involved, or something." She shivered. "I don't want to think about where I could have ended up if my daddy hadn't arranged things with the university. The tests haven't been that bad, I guess. Better than what I'd probably be doing with the government or the military."

I glance up at her eyes, tightened in frustration and fear, and can't help but agree. Granted, she's been secluded for the past few years because of all the college research, but that was likely inevitable with a girl growing larger than a hundred feet. I couldn't imagine how she might have suffered at the hands of a less humane military.

Then again, clinical scientific research could be pretty inhumane as well. I look back up toward Jess's face, trying to decipher whether or not her time at the university has been a pleasant one or not. "Probably. Still, they're at least treating you like a human being, right?"
11411121221.title: Life as a Giantess Lab Rat

11411121222.content:
"You know they don't let me out that often," Jess sniffles, cradling you even closer to her gigantic chest and face. "I pretty much had to beg to get to see you this afternoon," she whispers, her eyes tearing up again.

You wince, those double memories taking shape even as she's describing her circumstances. "Yeah, I wish you could get away more often," you mumble, new scenes involving multiple discussions with some grizzled military general making their way into your mind. You grit your teeth at the recollection of those mind-numbing and negative discussions. "It's not fair that they keep you locked up so much."

She hiccups and nods, a slight yet loud whimper echoing around you. "They haven't learned anything for years," she moans as softly as she can, which still sounds rather loudly around you. "They don't think I can hear them, but they keep talking about how I'll be the ultimate defense or the unstoppable weapon or whatever if we get in a war or something." A few tears begin to fall. "I don't want to be some kind of weapon just because of my size..." she whispers.

You stand up as straight as you can, though you're aware that you're only an inch or so tall as seen by her, at most. "You'll never be a weapon if you don't want to be, Jess," you state with conviction. Reaching down, you stroke the index finger at your back. "I know you're far too kind and gentle for that."

"Thanks. I don't think I could be too." She smiles briefly, and you sense that she grows just a little bit, before a frown replaces her previous happiness. "But, still... Can't they just let me go? I mean..." She flushed, even as her tears still fell. "I guess I can't just live a normal life... not like you, you know..." She trailed off, her entire body sagging.

"Sure you could." You smile for the sake of your friend. "It doesn't matter that you're as large as you are, Jess. You're still a wonderful person. I'll be your friend no matter how big you get."
11411121222.title: Life as a Giantess Weapon

choices: "Three days? I dunno. Honestly, I think it's speeding up..."
"Six days? It's been about an inch a day."
11412.content:
Original Author: Rian

"Oh... oh." Jess said, her tone sounding a little different than before, running her hands through her curly brown hair, "I didn't... think... that you'd notice so quickly. Most would just assume I was in heels, but now that the shoes are off I guess that... is it that obvious?" her bright blue eyes stare directly into Jake's worryingly. "Well, I just noticed your shirt was..." Jake points at her belly button, exposed from her shirt. "Oh dammit." she replied, touching her shirt. Like magic, it expanded downwards and covered her entire torso. She did the same with her shorts as well. Jake looked dumbfounded. "It's you doing this?" "Well, yeah." Jess blushed, "I guess. I dunno. I can control it a little, but... I can't make it stop really...." Jake tries to wrap his mind around what's going on, but decides to drop it, instead asking the obvious, "How much have you grown? Like it total?"

"About seven inches." she replies. "Maybe eight now." she thinks for a second about it, "No. Definitely about eight. I've tried shrinking down the same way I make my clothes get bigger but... it just hasn't been working." "So... okay..." jake thinks, putting down his water, "what of it can you control?" "Well, I can cause objects to grow or shrink, books, clothes, whatever..." she explained, "Can't do other people or animals, I've tried on my parents and dog, doesn't work on them at all, and I can make myself grow, but, honestly, only about an inch of this" she puts her hand on her neck, around where her head used to be, "is intentional. I've tried shrinking myself, as I said, but no such luck." "So... how long has it been since you started growing?" Jake asks. Jess thinks about it for a second, before responding...

You could...

According to your research, it will only affect female humans, but you were expecting that. You know very little else about it, since you haven't tested it yet.

You pick up the vial and...

You clutch your stomach as you feel the formula go to work. You grin, even with the pain, as you anticipate what will come afterwards. You will become the largest woman ever, and be able to protect everyone!

The pain dies down, and...
1211.title: Drink it down

choices: To head to the nearest city to befriend the populace.
To go to your brother's house
12112.content:
Original Author: Kardo

You stretch, now feeling strangely tired. You reach upwards as high as you can. After only a minute of this, you feel your fingers brushing against the ceiling. You look down, and find your workbench is now only knee height to you. Your shorts and shirt seem to have no problem growing with you. This confuses you, but you decide that first things come first, and try to get out of the laboratory before you get any bigger.

You had planned ahead, fortunately, and installed a large door on one of the walls that leads outside. You reach over, but get distracted when your head bumps the 12 foot ceiling. You look up, worried, but it seems that your growth stopped right then. You get on your hands and knees and crawl as best you can out the door.

Once again, your careful planning helps you out. The entire area around your laboratory is devoid of people or houses, just trees as far as the eye can see.

You stand up once you're out, and stretch.

You grin, realizing your success, and decide...
12112.title: You double in size every hour.

choices: You get a growth spurt, just in time to freak out the woman even more.
Some people start showing up, trying to save the woman from you.
121121.content:
Original Author: Kardo

You start walking, finding it rather hard to walk through the forest, as the tree branches are directly in your face at your new height. As such, it takes you about an hour to make it out of the forest, and start across the flatland around the city. When you're nearly there, you see everything get smaller around you, and you realize that you just hit a growth spurt. You stop growing at 24 feet tall, and you find the walk easier. You enter the city, and look around. It seems everyone is at work right now, since no one seems to be nearby.

You hear a scream, and turn around to see a woman looking at you in shock. You grin and walk up to her. You put your hands on your hips and look down at her from your huge height. The woman starts running, and you briskly stroll along behind her, keeping up with her easily. She starts to get tired, so you walk a little quicker and catch up to her, then you walk in front of her and stand still, arms folded, trying to look as annoyed as possible.

Suddenly...
121121.title: To head to the nearest city to befriend the pop...

choices: Get the attention of a news helicopter.
Go help the city in other ways to show your good intent.
1211211.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

Your view of the woman starts to rise, and you realize you're growing again. It seems you had been 'chasing' her for about an hour. With internal glee, you watch as the woman becomes smaller and smaller as you pass 30 feet and then 40 feet. When you stop growing at 48 feet tall, you see that the woman's mind just can't take anymore as she faints. You catch her with your hand as she falls and ensure her body lands safely. Then again, you change your mind and move her unconscious form to the side of the road for her own safety.

You take a look around yourself at the city around you. Everything seems so small...so delicate to you now, and you know from your calculations that this would only become more so as your growth formula should wear off once you hit around a mile in height. ...That is, if you hadn't miscalculated and would need an antidote by then to stop. If that was true, well you'd never stop growing. Fortunately, you had thought about the concern for food and drink, and had thrown in the concern for breathing as well. You had no need for food or water or air thanks to a prior formula, which also rid you of the need to...use the little girls room.

Sexual needs, on the other hand...you were going to have to repress those yourself. You're confident you could do it, however. In the meantime, however, you hear a loud ring coming from the bank. A robbery in progress? Seems like the perfect opportunity to show the people of the world their new protector. With loud booms, you walk to the bank. A large, black van pulls away and attempts to drive away - it had to be the robbers' getaway vehicle. You gave the van a minute's head start...and then pursued after it. The result could only end one way...

"Gotcha!" You say as you easily grab hold of the van and peer inside at the black-masked robbers. "You guys are quite the cliche bank robbers, aren't you? Oh don't worry, I won't eat you. Crime leaves a bad taste in my mouth. Instead, you and I are going to take a little trip downtown!" you walk with the van in your hand to the police station, which seems to give you a less than welcome reception. At this size, their guns would be very ineffective, but tazers on the other hand would be about as effective as if you were normal size. Either way, you mean no trouble and hold your free hand up.

"Whoa, whoa, whoa. I don't want any trouble, officers. But I do come bearing a gift. Some people here who are very eager to sit in prison and think about what they've done, and possibly rethink their lives." You lower the van and tear the back door off, gently placing it by your foot once an officer moves out of the way, and tip the van back. The robbers spill out except for the driver who was buckled in, but a light squeeze around the van convinces him to get out and join his cohorts. Unsurprisingly, all three hold their wrists up to accept the handcuffs, apparently preferring to be in the custody of police than a giantess. The bags of money and other valuables spill out of the van as well.

"Ooh, I see we've been busy little robbers! Officers, I think you men and women can handle returning these to who they belong. In fact, I'm quite confident you can!" Smiling, you tip the van further to make sure that all of the stolen valuables have been emptied from the van, and then walk away from the station. You set down the slightly crumpled, back-less van in the nearest parking lot in case something of value still hadn't come out. Judging from the big clock on the front of town hall, you had about half and hour still before your next growth spurt. You ponder on what to do now.
1211211.title: Not quite 50 feet...

choices: Unforseen variable! Your growth is no longer double an hour, it's more!
12112111.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You think about going around and attempting to help them to show your good intent and desire to serve as the city, and eventually the world's protector. But while spooking that woman was admittedly fun, you don't want to have to be constantly chasing people down before you can help them. It carried an increased risk of causing damage to your surroundings and accidentally stepping on someone, neither of which was desirable. You need a way to inform the masses that you're here to help, even as you would inevitably grow bigger and bigger...

Luckily, a GTS News helicopter is flying nearby. Unfortunately, they haven't noticed you yet. Furthermore, the most direct path to it's current location was straight through several office buildings. There's nothing for it: you're just going to have to wait until time was up and you grew again to catch their attention. You sigh and say, "How's a girl to let the people know of her good intent when she can't even garner a news helicopter? I was hoping to let the word get out there before I reached 96 feet, but that doesn't seem like it's going to happen..."

Interestingly, you hear a voice by your hand. A feminine one. "E-excuse me, miss? D-did you say good intent? Then why were you chasing me around earlier?" You turn your head and look down to find the voice belonged to the woman from earlier. She has a surprisingly nice voice when she's not screaming her head off. You kneel down beside her and say, "I can have a bit of fun too, you know. Besides, I wasn't going to hurt you, and you didn't exactly leave me much choice. People seem so small, so delicate to me now and I've always wanted to protect the world. And growing bigger seems like the best way to do just that."

Just as you're about to keep talking with the woman, you hear the sound you had been waiting on: the loud bell chime of the clock above town hall.

DING-dong ding-dong...dong-ding dong-DING...! DONG....DONG....DONG....

It was now 3:00, and your body responds to the time by beginning to grow again. Thinking quickly, you gently grab the woman and hold her tight without harming her as you pass 60 and then 70 feet rapidly. "I'm sorry if this seems awkward for you, ma'am, but I want to be certain of your safety around my growing body. I'm a gentle soul. Really!" you say as you surpass 80 feet and start slowing down. Once your growth stops, you find yourself at the predicted 96 feet in height and you set the woman down as gently as though she were a feather falling from the sky, or something incredibly precious. (which as a living person, she was) She's still slightly startled, but seems to get over it more quickly than before.

"So, did you do this to yourself? And on purpose?" she asks, to which you nod and reply, "Yes, on both accounts. I combined Unobtanium with a small amount of crushed, powdered Kryptonite using a DeLorean going 80 miles an hour just as it got hit by a bolt of lightning...I'm just kidding. I'm not quite that good a scientist to combine fictional materials and events from Back to the Future. But a couple of the materials required were quite rare, and the formula also requires an incredible amount of care to fashion. A good thing too, as I wouldn't want it falling into the wrong hands. It's also precisely that reason I won't disclose the actual names of the materials."

The woman nods and then points up toward the other sound you have been hoping to hear: the thwomp of the news helicopter's rotor. "That is quite the story. I think the boys up in the helicopter will be interested to hear it and your claim to desire being a protector of the world as well. The world needs nice people who want to help it and others like you do. Too many these days are only interested in themselves, and little else." she says, and you begin to realize something: the woman you had chased, scared, and now just had a conversation with... She was the mayor! You had been planning on meeting the mayor eventually - you just hadn't expected to meet her this early.

One very pleasant interview later, the helicopter was off with a story for the 6 o'clock news. Although you know that you were going to grow at least 8 times bigger than you were currently by then, about 768 feet tall by your calculations, people will be able to know that your growing presence was meant to be a benevolent one. You discover pleasant surprise about a side effect of the formula: minor reality manipulation. Effectively, the mailbox you accidentally step on shows no sign of being under your foot at all, much less that and your entire weight. This means you needn't worry about damaging buildings or hurting people without outright wanting to. Good thing too, as you can just focus on helping others without worry!
12112111.title: Get the attention of a news helicopter.

choices: You stop again at 384 feet. Your now quadrupling your size per hour.
You don't stop until you're at least a mile tall!
You don't stop until you're even bigger than that!
121121112.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

As the hour passes, you do your best to help the town folks with their daily lives with your nearly 100 foot tall size. Some are understandably apprehensive about your presence, while others are happy that a pretty giantess is willing to help them and not hurt them. A few of the latter even mentioned this, which makes you blush slightly. While you've never thought of yourself as unattractive, it's still nice to hear complements about your beauty.

By 3:50 however, you feel that something is off about yourself... "Uh oh... I might be experiencing a delayed reaction. Should probably start thinking on an antidote to this - oh. Oh right. Kind of too big to fit in my lab now. I guess I'll just have to endure whatever this is." you mutter to yourself.

By 3:59, the feeling seems to have faded. You wonder if it was just a false alarm when the clock struck 4:00, and it was time for your body to grow. You quickly reach and surpass 100 feet in height and keep going. 110 feet comes and goes, and then so does 120 feet. As you grow past 130 feet, you move off to a more open area of the city to try and stay out of commuters' way. 140 feet passes you by, and then 150 feet follows shortly after.

160 feet and 170 feet pass without problem, but as the latter does something feels very wrong. You can't feel yourself slowing down in growth, even as you grow past 180 feet tall! "Crap. I'm not going to stop at 192 feet on this spurt. I thought I had all variables ironed out before I consumed my formula! Oh well, I was going to get bigger than that in the next hour anyway..." you say as quietly as you can.

Indeed, your body clears 190 feet and 200 feet without pause. 210 feet falls behind you, and after 220 feet you're still growing. As you surpass 230 feet in height, you admit there are worse things the formula could do as an unforeseen variable than make you grow even faster. As long as the city and world were safe, you can accept this slight hiccup in your predictions. After thinking that, you find yourself already 260 feet tall and still growing. As you pass 270 and 280 feet in height, you wonder when this growth spurt will end. Mostly out of curiosity.
121121112.title: Unforseen variable!

choices: A very "large" 'little' sister. Anywhere from 10-100 miles tall.
Truly a Giga Giantess, who knows how big she might get?
1212.content:
Original Author: TheMM

As you were thinking who exactly to test out your formula, fate decided for you.

Melissa, your younger sister of 16 walked right into your room and asked, "Hey, what's that?" But before you could make any sort of move, she snatched it from your hand and drank the whole thing in a single gulp.

"No! You shouldn't have drunk that in one gulp! It's incredibly potent." you cry out, even though it's far too late. Of the few things you did know about it, this stuff was certainly not met to be taken in such a massive concentrated form.

"Why?" she non-chalantly replied.
"W-Why?! Because nobody would know how big you might get!" you respond, trying to get Melissa to understand what she had done.
"Bigger? So I'm gonna get taller?" Melissa asked, "Like how tall?"
"I don't know. But you still shouldn't have done that. You might end up thousands of feet tall, if nothing more!" you continue, but this news actually makes her happier.
"Wow, thanks! I always wanted to be a giantess! And you just did that for me 'big' bro!" said Melissa, who then doubled over in pain. "Looks like it's startin...You might wanna get outta the house."

You quickly follow her advice, and leave. Soon enough, you see body parts of your younger sister push up against windows, then burst through as she out grows the house. Getting far too constrained, she simply stands up, destroying the entire building and already 100 feet tall. But she was by no means finished growing just yet.

Finding you and picking you up, you noticed that somehow her underwear had survived and were growing with her. That was weird, but then again, you had never expected anyone to drink the whole thing. Sighing to yourself, you wondered just how big she was going to get.
1212.title: 'Little' sister.

12123.content:
Original Author: rideau

Exponentially growing past 1, 10, 50 and even 100 kilometers in height, Melissa looked in awe at the planet's curvature as she surpassed country after country in size. The experience was all the more intense because of all the power flowing through her. As an unexpected side effect of the formula had become invulnerable and able to change reality at will, and Melissa was aware of it. It was fortunate, since at such size she would have unavoidably caused a cataclysm with every step otherwise. She could stop growing whenever she wanted, but she wanted to see how much would last her growth spurt.
12123.title: A goddess is born

Original Author: infinity 421

1213.title: How about a different scenario?

choices: It's a burp. The formula's not THAT fast-acting...
12131.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You head over to your friend's place to deliver the formula. You briefly consider letting your daughter drink it, but you could just make more if this worked. Once there, you knock on the door and Lisa opens the door. "What a pleasant surprise! *gasp* Is that what I think it is? Ohmygoshohmygoshohmygosh!" Excitable as always. You put a hand on her shoulder and say, "That it is, Lisa! But first, please calm down. You've had this dream for...okay, I don't even know how long now, but you're 39 years old, girl. You needn't act like a 12 year old!"

Lisa may have been 39, but her body certainly didn't. In fact, she looked about half her age. You wish you could look as good as she does at her age, but parenting has taken its toll. Not that your daughter has ever been that hard to raise. Lisa calms down and asks, "Sorry. Uh, so...exactly how big can I expect to get with that? If it's anything less than double digits I'm going to be disappointed." you chuckle at this and reply, "This little vial has enough potency to make you grow at least 1...mile tall. I can't be certain if it'll be all in one go or if it'll be in a series of spurts, as this stuff is entirely untested. But hey, why spoil the surprise, right?"

Lisa giggles, her DD breasts jiggling with her, and says, "You are the best mad scientist I've ever met!" she then squeezes you in a hug like one would a teddy bear. You blush a bit and try to keep from dropping the formula. She then asks, "Um...will my..." you finish for her and answer, "...clothes grow with you? It was hard, let me tell you, but I managed to get that in there. Whatever you have on when you drink it will grow with you. Not sure about socks or shoes, though." another tight and pleasant hug ensues.

You wait as she goes inside to change into the outfit she wanted to wear as a giantess, which is revealed to be her swimsuit. You hand the formula over and she pops the cap, then downs the dark green liquid in one gulp. "Ugh. I think Buckley's cough syrup tastes better than this... But I think I can feel it working...like something rising up from within me... Something that I want to let out badly... Here it comes!"
12131.title: My friend the (soon to be) giantess.

12132.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You visit Lisa and offer the formula, but to your surprise she declines, saying she's changed her mind and is fine being the size she is. Disappointed, you go home and set the formula aside.

As the morning passes, you ponder if you should drink it, but you aren't into being a towering giantess like your research said this would make a human female. You're tempted to just toss it away, but the scientist in you screams at you what a terrible waste that would be. So what to do with it? Then it hit you: if your friend Lisa didn't want it, and you didn't want it...your daughter most certainly would. Her birthday was today, too, and she always said she wanted to be a towering giantess to look out for people. What a kind girl. You're proud to say you raised her well. She would greatly enjoy this birthday present.

But how old was she again?
12132.title: Daughter

choices: She activates, and grows through the ceiling.
123.content:
Original Author: Kardo

You open your front door to find a human-sized box on the front porch. For a moment, you have no idea what to do, as you just stare at it, open mouthed. You decide that you might as well bring it in and open it up. The box just barely fits in the door, and is rather heavy. Once you get it inside, you get a crowbar and pop it open. You are stunned when you look inside and see... a woman in a maid outfit. Once again, you have no idea what to do, when you spot a piece of paper on the bottom of the crate. You pick it up, and start reading.

"New Robotic Maid, programmed with a friendly, hard working personality. Learns new things easily. Tries to improve self whenever possible. Press her nose to activate her."

You quickly press the nose, which feels just like a human nose,
123.title: A robotic maid

choices: You find your voice, and start speaking.
You realize that she's slowly growing taller!
She runs out of things to clean.
1231.content:
Original Author: Kardo

A few moments pass in near silence. The robot in front of you twitches a few times, perhaps booting up.After a few moments, her eyes open. "Oh. Hello." she says, "I am a Robotic Maid Mk. 3000. Registering you as new master.... done. I shall do my best to make your life easier, master." she says, bowing. Her voice doesn't sound the least bit synthesized.

You are still surprised, of course, and can't think of anything to say. "If master doesn't have any specific requests for me, I'll begin cleaning." she quickly walks around the room, cleaning the furniture with a duster and a cloth that she took out of the front pocket of her dress. The job done is amazing. Everything that she passes by is quickly rendered spotless, and she's very careful with the things on the mantle.

This continues for a moment until...
1231.title: She activates normally.

choices: "No, no, that's enough for now" you say.
"Since you aren't responding, I guess you wish it to be so." she says, growing.
1233.content:
Original Author: Kardo

The maid lurches and shakes, before slowly calming down. After a moment, her eyes pop open.

"Hello Master." she says, bowing. "I will now seek to improve myself. Converting surrounding dust and unneeded elements into components."

Before you have a chance to say anything, the robot maid, dress and all, starts growing. Her expressionless face does not change as her head rises higher and higher, eventually hitting the ceiling. She bends at her waist without even changing expression.

After a few moments, she bursts through the ceiling. Her dress remains unharmed by the jagged edges of the newly opened roof. She continues to rise higher, finally coming to a stop once her foot is about the size of you.

"Is this enough, master?" she says from way above you, bowing. "Or do you want me bigger already?"
1233.title: She activates, and grows through the ceiling.

choices: Have your new "home" grow even bigger
12333.content:
Original Author: jimhiggins

You pause for a long moment, staring up in amazement at the colossal mechanical servant towering a few stories above your household. You're completely at a loss as to what to do or say – in your mind, "improvements" certainly hadn't translated into "extreme growth" when you read the details of your new robotic maid.

She patiently waits as you slowly examine her artificial but oh so incredible and enticing curves, somewhat hidden beneath her sexy French maid outfit. Before long, however, she nods resolutely and begins to straighten up once again. "Since you are not responding, I assume you wish it to be so. Once more converting surrounding dust and unneeded elements into components."

Before you can react, you see her stretch one glove-covered hand out, fingers spread. Suddenly, it morphs and lengthens, forming into what looks to be a vacuum cleaner hose and fan attachment... a fact quickly proven true as she turns and simply begins to suck things up throughout the neighborhood. You can't really tell from your vantage point still inside your own home, but you're hoping that she's not targeting other houses... or people.

Your floorboards offer a keening groan, and you look down to realize that her foot is starting to grow again, along with her entire body. A little worried for your safety, you dash for the front door, hoping to leave the premises before your new maid's feet bring it down around you. Once outdoors you glance upward, hoping beyond hope that your pretty robotic servant hasn't become a harbinger of doom, callously absorbing humanity and all its advancements just for the sake of "improving" herself.

Luckily, it seems like she's holding true to her word, spending all her effort on sucking up garbage, dust, and scrap metal. You are a bit curious about the random trees and rocks that seem to get absorbed, as well as a couple swimming pools full of water, but you don't really know what to say about it. Maybe they're needed for coolant or something...

Suddenly, a loud splintering sound brings your attention back to closer matters at hand. You glance down in shock and realize that your once-small robot maid is now slowly destroying your house with her ever expanding legs and feet. Wood fragments and shingles are spilling all over your lawn, and you can hear the clink of shattered dishes and the hissing of ruptured water pipes. Your jaw drops in consternation as you mentally tally up the damages. This maid was supposed to be helping you?!

The ground rumbles ominously, and after a moment, you see a bus-sized shoe emerge from your collapsing household, the shiny black surface completely obliterating all wood, brick, and mortar in its path. It hovers briefly in the air for a short moment before moving behind your crumbling property and slamming with a ground-shaking thud upon your back lawn. The second shoe follows the first, and after another teeth-rattling step, you find yourself on your butt, staring numbly at the remains of your home and the enormous sock-clad legs behind it.

You don't have long to contemplate the current state of affairs, however. Before the last rumbles of that final step can fade, a fantastically loud roar begins to fill the air, and you glance up in sudden horror. Sure enough, your maid is slowly swinging her vacuum-arm in your direction, no doubt intending to "clean up" the mess she had just made. Her completely impassive face seems incredibly foreboding and monstrous now, as if you've become a mere insect to be swept up and discarded.

You scream out in terror, but there's little you can do. The extremely powerful suction easily pulls you and the remains of your house into the air and down your maid's vacuum-arm, deep within the mechanical titan. You yell again as you flail and bounce among the debris flying down the pitch black hose, certain that you're about to meet your end as you endure countless minor cuts and bruises, when you're suddenly shunted into a much smaller tube. This tube is actually lined with a number of lighted panels, illuminating the metallic chute. There's not much else to see other than you and this long tube, but at least you're not surrounded by junk in complete darkness anymore. After a moment, you encounter a rather cool mist as you travel, and strangely enough, you even start to feel better again. You glance down in astonishment as the mist seems to cling to your wounds, sealing up the minor cuts with a skin-colored jelly and mitigating the discoloration from the bruising. You're baffled, but now a bit hopeful. Perhaps you'll survive after all...

After what seems like a long minute or so, you suddenly come flying out of the passage and are surprised by the sudden glare of sunlight. For one horrified moment, you deduce that you've just been ejected from her body again, and are likely soaring a great number of feet above ground level. Gravity reasserts itself, and your stomach drops faster than the rest of you as your upward ascent slows to a stop before reversing direction. You tightly close your eyes, screaming once again, deciding that this is a much crueler way to go, especially after being healed.

Abruptly, you feel your body impact a rather soft and giving surface. Still, the impact is sudden and jarring enough to bring you to a few hacking coughs.

"Don't worry, Master. I have you now. Please relax."

You start at the loud but pleasant voice that seems to penetrate your entire being. Taking a few deep breaths and blinking to clear the spots from your vision, you turn toward the source of the greeting.

"See, Master? Everything is perfectly fine. I could not possibly bring myself to directly cause you any harm. It is against my primary programming."

You barely hear her, though you do log the information in your memory. Right now, you're just a bit too preoccupied by the extremely enormous face filling your entire field of vision.

She really is quite beautiful, now that you can see her up close. Even knowing that she is entirely artificial, her skin looks creamy and smooth, her hair seems lustrous and sleek, and her lips appear kissably soft and even glisten somewhat, though you know it can't be due to saliva. Everything about her features scream "I am a gorgeous sexy woman!" and you find yourself imagining what it would be like to hold and caress such a beautiful creature...

Of course, since those lips seem to be at least as tall as you are, that places a severe damper on your fantasy, even as you try to escape the unbelievable reality before you. You estimate her head somewhere in the vicinity of 150 feet in height, which would make her entire body at least 1000 feet tall. Glancing slowly to the left and right, you realize with trepidation that you're sitting on the gloved palm of her left hand, suspended few hundred feet above the ground. Subconsciously, you grip the fabric beneath you as tightly as possible, just in case. Returning your gaze forward again, you proceed to stare at her face for a very long time, your mind having shut down in the whirlwind of changes and commotion over the past half-hour.

The giantess maid simply stares back, her expression not changing. "I am very sorry that you were injured earlier," she begins once again, likely because you have failed so far to respond to any of her statements. "I have tried my best to tend to your wounds. Do you hurt anywhere, Master? Is there anything I can do to ease your pain?"

You blink, your mind rebooting somewhat at the memory of being vacuumed up, along with the remains of your house. After a few heavy breaths, you feel centered enough to respond.

"Ease my pain?! What were you thinking, earlier? You vacuumed me up... along with my house! You simply destroyed it! How was it an 'unneeded element'? Now I don't even have a place to live!"

She cocks her enormous expressionless head slightly to the side, a disturbingly human motion, and easily replies, "Yes you do, Master. I merely incorporated your old house into myself. From now on, my own body is your home. You are free to dwell within me for the rest of your days, and I shall provide you with every possible need."

Your jaw drops and a heavy blush colors your face. "W-within you?!?"

She nods. "Shall I show you to your front door?"

You gulp. "Uh... s-sure?"

An incredible sense of vertigo nearly overwhelms you as she lowers her hand to her midsection. You almost find yourself flying into the air, but your iron-tight grip on her glove practically keeps your body from budging. After you stop moving, you pause for a moment to catch your breath and your bearings. At your current position, you're level with a twenty foot diameter cylinder extending slightly through a slit in her outfit, around where a human's naval would be. Strangely enough, your old front door, complete with porch and a couple steps, adorns the end of the protrusion. You blink in astonishment, and a moment later the porch light shines invitingly.

You lean back, your eyes widening as you spot your maid looking down at you from above her impressive bosom. Blood rushes to your head, and you feel even more overwhelmed than before.

"Well, Master, is it to your liking?"

You slowly nod in reply.

She offers a small smile, the first reaction of any sort you've seen on her face, before resuming her impassive stare. "Well, what would you like to do next? Do you wish to explore your new home? Or shall I improve myself some more?"
12333.title: The Incredible Growing Maid

choices: Feeling adventurous, you take your "mobile home" on the road
Before you can do anything, a nervous police force surrounds your enormous maid
123331.content:
Original Author: jimhiggins

You ponder the options for just a short moment. While the thought of your new maid growing even larger is rather intriguing, her already more than impressive stature is equally intimidating, and quite superfluous. She's literally the only thing you have left that needs cleaning and maintenance now, so why would she need to be any bigger at all? It's not as though you have other homes, office buildings, or extensive tracts of land that require the attention of an enormous housekeeper or landscaper. Additionally, the speed with which she incorporates materials into improving herself seems to multiply exponentially the larger she grows – who knows how big she may become after another of her "development by cleaning" sessions. You already feel that it will take a little time to grow accustomed to a one thousand foot tall pretty mechanical servant, particularly when she herself is now your new living quarters.

That in itself seems like the far more interesting prospect at present, and your curiosity grows the more you consider the possible layout of your new home.

"Actually," you drawl as you slowly look back and forth between your new front door and your maid's face, looming a couple hundred feet overhead, "I think I'd like to look around... inside... for a little while." You swallow, realizing in embarrassment what such a statement might sound like when talking to a girl regardless of her size, especially concerning her body. Even if she is a robot maid, her features still seem far too realistic... apart from the warmly lit porch jutting out of her midsection.

She nods. "As you wish, Master. Please, come inside."

You blush again at the wording, then grip her glove tightly as she gently moves her hand closer to the front door, stopping again when the entrance is about ten feet away. Shakily, you rise to your feet and take a few tentative steps forward. But apart from the surprising amount of cushion and suppleness in her synthetic flesh, even accounting for the glove, her palm is rock steady and doesn't feel any different from walking across soil. By the time you step before the door and reach for the knob, you can almost imagine yourself simply returning to your house from a very long day.

Well, so long as you keep your attention focused entirely on the door, something that's extremely hard to do when you're walking across the palm of an enormous robotic maid held hundreds of feet in the air. Swallowing, and with an air of cautious anticipation, you turn the knob and pull.

What lies beyond is a remarkably decorated foyer about twenty feet square, complete with wood panel floors, a few decorative lamps secured to the cream-colored metallic walls, and even a few... windows? Flabbergasted, you step toward one of the rectangular depressions in the wall. As you get closer, you realize that it actually contains a monitor that's reproducing the view as if you were actually looking from a window over 500 feet above ground level. It's actually quite remarkable.

Suddenly, the image flickers and is replaced with a three dimensional rendering of your maid from the waist up. The digital avatar bows her head. "Welcome to your home, Master." The sound seems to permeate your entire being, and you notice that there are dozens of embedded speakers at various locations in the ceiling and walls. You're very impressed. This will at least allow your maid to communicate with you without having to direct her mouth toward her midsection. That would look rather bizarre, if strangely arousing – a giant girl speaking to her own belly and bosom as they could hear and respond.

You turn back to the monitor and make eye contact with the avatar. "Well, I guess... I'm home. So... how about some kind of tour?"

The avatar bows again. "As you wish, Master. Would you like me to draw up a schematic of my body on this monitor for you, or would you prefer to physically explore within me instead?"

Good grief, half the things she says now have extremely suggestive connotations. Privately, you wonder if she's wording her statements that way on purpose.

Working some moisture into your mouth, you respond, "I think I'll take a look around myself."

"Very well, Master. If you will come to the back of the foyer, I shall explain the current layout of your new residence." The avatar bows one last time before flickering out of existence, only to be replaced by the elevated view of the countryside.

Taking one last look at the scenery and around the foyer, you turn and head to the large door on the other end of the room. Unlike the front door, which resembles your old entrance and turns on hinges, this door looks like a leftover prop from Star Trek, a souped-up elevator door. As you draw near, the door parts, sliding open and bidding you onward. You step across the threshold into a curving hallway with light tan carpeting and the same cream-colored walls.

"This level contains two gathering rooms and a restroom," your maid comments, the sound again coming from speakers in the ceiling, and you glance down the hall. Along the outer wall to your left and right, you see a couple other doors, presumably leading to rooms similar in size to the foyer. "This will provide you with ample space, Master, should you desire to invite guests into your home."

You wonder briefly about how to phrase such an invitation, before deciding that it would still sound rather suggestive.

Directly across from you is another set of double doors, but these legitimately resemble an elevator entrance, as evidenced by the lighted display above showing where the lift is currently stationed. The doors suddenly part, revealing a fairly sizable elevator compartment. "The kitchen, bedrooms, and master bathroom can be found on other levels. The observatory and master control room may also be reached from here."

Observatory? Master control room?

"Ah. Well, I guess I can take a look at the other stuff later... I'd kind of like to see the observatory."

"As you wish, Master. Please step into the lift."

Suiting actions to words, you enter the small room. A lighted display blinks to life to your left, showing a rather detailed representation of your maid. A small red dot is currently glowing at her midsection, obviously highlighting your current location. To the right of the figure is a series of words describing the various levels – Lobby, Kitchen, and Bedroom floors are located around her waist; the Observatory and Master Control Room are situated higher up, near her chest. The Observatory level suddenly blinks green, and you feel the elevator rise beneath your feet, carrying you upward.

After twenty seconds on the smoothest lift you've ever ridden, you find yourself in a rather spacious room that encircles the elevator shaft. The donut-shaped space is nearly 50 feet in diameter, with a ceiling rising 15 feet above your head. A few couches and low-standing tables occupy the carpeted floor space, arranged in small groups and generally pointed away from the entrance. The reason is obvious – the entire outer wall is comprised of a near seamless screen, currently showing an unobstructed view of the surrounding landscape.

Awed by the grandeur, you step closer to the wall, noting with ill-concealed astonishment that the view even seems to shift based upon your position in the room. It's as if you are honestly looking through a glass window, instead of a manipulated video display with an additional twenty feet or so of robotic body separating you from the true outdoors. The effect is mind-boggling... and incredibly breathtaking.

"This is the observatory, Master. Here you may relax and enjoy the view. Or..." One large section of screen fades to black before displaying a handful of iconic logos, all of them quite familiar. "...you may also select a movie to watch or an electronic game to play. My internal processors are well equipped to upscale any video to properly display on the high resolution of these screens. And I can most certainly serve any food or drink you desire while you rest here."

You collapse into an extremely plushy couch, the sheer incredibility of this entertainment setup boggling your mind. You stare at the various logos for a few long moments, desperately trying to collect yourself again, before the screen brightens to white, against which a 9 foot representation of your maid appears.

She inclines her head, again looking far too humanistic. "Well, Master? Is it to your liking so far?"

You slowly nod your head. "Yeah... it's incredible."

She smiles again and bows. "Thank you, Master. I only aim to please." Her face once again impassive, she asks, "Do you wish to continue your tour?"

You consider for a moment. While examining the gathering rooms and your bedroom might be intriguing prospects, right now you feel like exploring the possibilities of this incredible observatory instead. Casting a quick glance at the screens still showing the outside world, you lock eyes with your maid's avatar and offer a grin, the first true smile you've shown since opening the mysterious package earlier that day. "Not right now. Actually, I'm thinking it's time for a road trip..."
123331.title: A Maid-to-Order Mansion

choices: Keep her at this height for now
1233311.content:
Original Author: jimhiggins

"A road trip, Master?" your maid asks, her avatar cocking her head to the side once again. This time, you find it particularly adorable. Perhaps you're really starting to warm up to her and her mannerisms. Or maybe the excitement of a trip is brightening your mood considerably.

You nod, the idea sounding better each time you consider it. "Absolutely. There's a lot of places I've never been, and with you, I'll be able to travel pretty quickly... and even take my home with me! It'll be great!"

She straightens again. "As you wish, Master. I have a complete world atlas stored in memory and a direct link to multiple global positioning satellites. Simply tell me where you wish to go, and I can take you there."

"Perfect," you reply, the possibilities swirling through your mind. Feeling particularly merry and charitable, you add, "And we can even go anywhere you'd like to go as well. Assuming you have a place in mind." She might not, but her random humanistic mannerisms have already blurred your concept of her as a mindless slave merely obeying every order. Perhaps she does have a wish buried deep within her artificial intelligence.

She blinks a couple times, her eyes widening fractionally. "Anywhere... I... would like to go, Master?"

You shrug and offer her a somewhat bemused and embarrassed smile. "Well... yeah. I mean, I don't know if a robotic maid really has a place she wants to go... but the offer is there if you like."

She stares at you for a very long time. Then, she flashes you a full smile, her eyes glimmering with what has to be some incredible lighting effects. In an oddly breathy voice, she softly replies, "Why thank you very much, Master. I am most gladdened and honored by your thoughtfulness and generosity. I shall do my very utmost to repay your selflessness a million-fold."

You may have considered her gorgeous earlier, but seeing her smiling so widely makes you realize that she is the most incredibly beautiful thing on the planet.

A moment passes before she closes her eyes and slowly shakes her head back and forth. You blink, the spell broken, and sheepishly rub the back of your neck. When you meet her eyes again, her face is again expressionless, and you can't help but feel both saddened and amused by the transition.

"Very well, Master. Where would you like to go first?"

You pause to consider for a second, and it doesn't take long before the first thing pops into your mind. "Well, I've never actually been to New York City... I'd kinda like to see the Big Apple at some point in my life." You grin. "And see how much taller than the Statue of Liberty you've become."

She nods. "Of course, Master. And how soon would you like to leave?"

You shrug. "Now is as good a time as any. I didn't have any other plans for the weekend."

"Then we shall leave immediately, Master. I just have one last question before we depart. Do my current capabilities sufficiently meet your needs and desires? Or should I improve myself again?"

You blink. That indeed is a good question. She is already fantastically enormous, and making her grow even further seems rather ridiculous and unnecessary, and possibly even dangerous. Already, her stature is probably destroying and threatening many people, animals, buildings, and the surrounding environment itself. Her shoes themselves must be at least 100 feet long, and who knows how many tons of force she's applying to the ground just by standing there. Besides, you can see the countryside perfectly fine from this height.

On the other hand, a larger maid will mean a larger home. The space within the observatory will expand even larger, and everything else from the foyer to your yet-to-be-seen bedroom might become much more lavish and extravagant, as if you've become an aristocrat living in an enormous mansion. Not only that, but a taller servant will travel much faster, and you will be able to see much farther from a much higher position. And who can deny that an enormous sexy maid is a bad thing?

Granted, you can always improve your servant in the future, but what shall you do in the present?
1233311.title: Places to Go and Things to See

choices: Yes, state police surroudned the maid.
No, went to statue of liberty without trouble.
12333111.content:
Original Author: Mr.person

You knew if you ordered your maid to become more bigger, there would be an uproar below the ground. You already had the answer and then spoke to the robotic maid.

"Not right now. I don't want to harm anyone below me." You said.

"Understood master. We shall now depart." maid said.

She then stood up, showing the view more better in your position then from her back, a jet wing apeared. Just then, a quick noise were made and within minute, the jet fire were made. The jet fire didn't touch the ground to prevent any death or injury to the civilians and she flew high up. You were amazed by what she did and Once she got to the sky, she started to move toward the city of newyork. You were amazed by this and you sat on the chair behind the desk to relax, and then part of the desk opened, revealing a cup of coke with it.

"Please enjoy the drink while the flight, master." Maid said.

"Wow, thanks." You replied.

You took the cup of coke and took some sips. It was good and you relaxed as the maid were flying toward new york, you drifted into sleep. You slept for at least 2 hours until a small tremor were made, making you wake up. You get up, looking around to see what was going on until you noticed the big city infront of you! It was Manhatten! just then, the image of your maid appeared in the screen and spoke to you.

"We are now at new york, master." Maid spoke.

"Cool..Just COOL!!" You shouted in happiness,

The maid giggled little, and she landed safely at the open field just outside of the manhatten. You were excited about this as you were now at new york! The maid then spoke to you again.

"Now then, where is your first destination?" maid asked.

"Well, First place you should always go in new york is the statue of liberty!" You replied.

"As you wish, master." Maid complied.

Did something happen before she went toward the statue?
12333111.title: Destination: Gotham city!

choices: Become so huge that the world can be inside me and so that I could protect it
12333112.content:
The maid straitened up and in a matter of seconds started to grow. You first begin to hear metal grinding against itself, it's very painful sound making you hold your ears in pain. Then your room gets even bigger, the furniture stays the same but the atual room gets longer. After a few more seconds, the growing stops.

You look out the window to see the clouds blocking your sight. You also noticed the air was thicker as well meaning you were very high up, about where a plane usually files. If that's true then was there any limit to how big the robot could ge? Could it get any bigger? Does it have a limit? While asking yourself these questions you realized something.

This robot, who followed your every command was basically unstoppable, not even nukes could stop it. Luckily for the world you had no interest in doing any evil things. As long as everyone treated you with respect and left you alone, they were cool in your book. Of course, when the government found out about the goddess maid, they would most definitely want to use her. Like hell they would!

"Master, are you ok?" The maids voice spoke to you, her words roaring like thunder, but still keeping the calm, sweet, voice you knew and loved.

"Yea I'm okay. So uhh, how big did you get"? You wanted to know, seeing as to when you looked out the window, you cold see the clouds.

" I am 10000 feet tall master. Would you like me to get bigger?" A gasp escaped your mouth. She could get even bigger, he wouldn't have believed it if not for the giant maid being a robot that told no lies. It could have been mistaking but still, that seemed very unlikely.

You quickly answered the machine back "NO, I mean no, uhh, no thank you, this will be enough". You try to compose yourself but your finding it to be very difficult. This maid was gigantic and from the sound I it could get even bigger. You breath in and out slowly, once you calmed down enough the maid talked again.

" I am sorry master if this has frightened you, I was just doing what you wanted. Would you like me to shrink back in size?"
"No, honestly you being this big, nothing on this world could hurt me, especially now that I'm inside you, which is still very weird to say out loud."

You hear the maid take a huge step, in the ocean of course, the maid making sure no bystanders got hurt. The step caused your room to shake a little as well. You then sit on the couch and sigh thinking of what the giantess would surprise you with next. You then ask the maid a strange question, even as you said it made you think how dumb it sounded. " Hey what do you want to do".
12333112.title: Have her improve herself again

choices: Make her as big as she wants
123331121.content:
She Answered you Immediately "To serve you master, that is my purpose." Well she is a robot, so her answer is of course going to be bland you thought. You tried to ask her again just a bit more specifically, " Well-no, I mean is there something you have always wanted, like something you like to do, besides serving me".

The Giant robot stoped moving abruptly causing you to fall on the ground. Suddenly the front of your house opens, the sky now dark and filled with stars. Your maids hand picking you up gently, bringing you to her blank face. While she had no facial features, you could tell it was giving you a curious look.

After a few seconds, she spoke " Master you are asking me what I want"? Her voice which up until now was bland, had a almost cheerful tone to it, as well as sincere. You nodded.

Your maid looked at you for a second and then hugged you. It hurt like hell and could have broken your body, but it was still nice.

After the extremely long and uncomfortable hug, she put you back in her body. The house formed around you again and you heard her powerful voice answer your question " I want to be BIGGER".

1313.title: Self-Enchantment

choices: You cast it on yourself and start to grow.
Before you can use it, your sister/mother takes the book and uses it!
You decide to test it on someone else
13132.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

You have had it up to here with all the short jokes people think are funny to slap on you. Of course you don't want to hurt said people, or anyone for that matter. You want to be tall. Really tall. Like tall enough for people to think twice about trying for tall jokes. Like a mile! ...or maybe more! ...Okay, you just want to make up for all the years of being 4 feet tall. You hadn't grown since grade school even though your 18 year old body has blossomed in other ways.

One day, while rummaging in your favorite old/used book store, you come across a particularly old and heavy tome. Adorned with odd symbols, suns, moons, and stars, it clearly looks like what one would expect...of a spell book. Perhaps some magician threw it here by mistake? Surely it can't be a real spell book...could it? Every idiot knew magic wasn't real! ...Right? You ask the shopkeeper, "Hey, when did this book come in?" and he gives you a stare like you had two heads - neither of which screwed on right as he replies, "I've never seen that book around here, and I go through every book that comes in this store. You can have it if you want it. Consider it a gift if you like."

You thank him and buy another random book from him, letting him keep the change. You simply couldn't just not give the kind old man something, hardly anyone seems to come into his store. You leave and head home...after a bite to eat. Your stomach is now protesting about not getting nourishment for itself while your mind was getting at least something for itself. And thus, you find yourself at McDonald's soon after.

Once your stomach is satisfied with the Big Mac and fries you eat, after having to argue with the cashier over not wanting a stinking Happy Meal, you finally head home. Once there, you head into your room and close the door to read this book in private.

As you read, you quickly come to realize that this thing is the real deal. ...Or a really elaborate hoax. Sadly nothing about a Philosopher's Stone, the holy grail of magical items said to be able to turn nearly anything into gold and grant immortality, but then you remember this is a spell book. Not an alchemy book. No real wand-waving required, the spells supposedly work just fine without verbally saying them so long as the caster focuses on it, which is a relief so as to not look like an idiot.

There's a wide variety of spells available as well. One for an instant meal and/or drink, one to clean near any mess, one to be able to hold one's breath indefinitely, even one to make it practically rain gold coins! The latter seems to infer that it'd do it for whatever currency the caster thinks of at the time. If Monopoly money, it'd be a lot of colorful paper bills. But one in particular catches your eye. "A growth spell, huh? Very interesting... And how thoughtful! It includes the caster's target's current attire! Oh, a girl could have a lot of fun with this thing... May be a good idea to memorize the spell in case the book doesn't grow with me. Some of these other ones might not be a bad idea either."

You crack down and study the spells in the book until you think you are ready...
13132.title: 13-18 (Teen)

choices: You stop... For now... Will a relative also find your magic book?
You cast more growth spells – and end up massively overdoing it!
131321.content:
Original Author: unknown.

You've memorized the spell in case the book doesn't grow with you, and you know that you're easily capable of casting it. You've also found a few other spells, ones that will be extremely useful – a spell that takes away your need for food, water, and even air; another one that prevents you from destroying anything, no matter how hard you step on it; and lastly, one that prevents anyone from being harmed should they fall off your body while you're a giantess.

Those should allow you to grow as big as you want without causing a mini-apocalypse, so you've memorized those, as well. A few other spells also caught your eye; breast and butt enlargement spells – not that you didn't already have a sizable bust and butt, but hey, bigger is always better, right? – spells that would make your entire body into a flawless and beautiful one, no matter what it looked like; spells that would allow your clothes to grow with you; and much, much more!

You wait until night to cast the spell. Desk lamp switched on and aimed at your mirror, you look at yourself for a second – did black hair and green eyes really suit you? With your new magic, you could change yourself so that you had blonde hair and blue eyes, red hair and brown eyes, hell, even red and gold eyes and blue and purple hair – and it would technically be natural! You'd probably give it a try later.

Marking your current height on the wall besides your mirror, you close your eyes and concentrate on the words of the growth spell. Almost immediately, a warmth fills your body, and you quietly moan – before it subsides as quickly as it had come. Opening your eyes, you check your mark on the wall – and note with utter glee, that you are now four feet, two inches tall! You cast the spell that will cause your clothes to keep up with you – time to have fun! You cast the growth spell again, and again, and again, and again, and again, standing proudly at five feet in height. The warmth growth brings is so nice, that you want to keep growing forever – but you refrain from casting another height growth spell. Next up are your already impressive boobs and butt. A spell or two each sees them swelling larger, and larger, the denim shorts and purple tank top you had put on stretching and reshaping themselves to cope with your growing proportions.

Five feet tall... Should you stop now? Or continue?
131321.title: First Round of Spells

1313212.content:
Original Author: unknown

You giggle, the warm glow delightfully tickling you. With each spell you feel better and better, why stop now? You cast the breast enlargement spell a few more times, you're expanding out a few more sizes.

You smile back at the figure in the mirror... but it's still not enough! You want more of that wonderful feeling, but what else can you do? Facing your reflection, you frown. Five foot is far to small to show your magnificent body off the world and you never want these sensations to stop!

Without even thinking you cast the spell again and again and again! Joy fills you once more as that tingly sensation fills you again. You watch the height chart as you rise again, not stopping your spell casting. Five foot two... Five foot four... you start to feel giddy as you rise higher and higher. Five foot... seven? The process seems to be speeding up! Five foot ten... Six foot two! Its getting harder to mark your growth on the chart, before another spurt kicks in. Six foot six... at this point you're one of the tallest people you've ever seen... six ten! A part of you wonders if you should casting before this gets out of hand, but this feels so good! She stepped back and the crowds fell silent, awaiting her speech.

"We, the folk of the Sky Plains are gathered here today to witness the ascension of daughter Emilia. As all born to the Sky Plains, you have toiled near the ground, dwelt with men and unascended young women of the Plains, and you have respected and taken caution near the foot of the mighty ascended women of our Plains. But fate has blessed you, Emilia. The natural arcane magic flows through these grounds. You were born female, which is a rarity in these lands. You have shown that you are a daughter of humility and compassion, with a willingness to help your fellow small folk; your heart is not full of malice or contempt which has had some daughters of the Plains banished before their ascension. You have survived the foot of the careless ascended, and all other elements of these lands, and for 18 years now, you have been absorbing the magic of these lands. It now flows through you, simply waiting to be unlocked, and when it does, you will join your sisters of the Sky Plains high in the clouds above the ground you walk. Your brothers and unascended sisters will be like ants to you, but you will treat them with respect and compassion, for you once toiled as they do."
Elizabeth then picks Emilia up and holds her level with her eyes.
"Look out across the land Emilia, for this is how you will soon see the land as one of the ascended."
She then placed her back on the platform.
"Look at your brothers, for this is the last time you will see them eye to eye; the last time you will see them as equals"
Emilia looks around with obvious excitement in her eyes.
"Lastly, gaze upon us, the ascended, for this is the last time you will see us with fear and awe, for you will soon see us as equals."
With that the priestess reached down and handed Emilia the same leather undergarments that all the other ascended wore.
"These are he garments of the ascended. The cloth you wear will tear, but these garments will match your size during your ascension and never wear our or become dirty. Have you any final statements before I unlock your power?"

In a few minutes, I'll have over the limit of nitrogen, and I'll.. uh... grow." she stands up, and you do as well. "I mean, I'm already much taller than you guys, any more height and I'll be unable to fit in any of your buildings, and I've heard that earth people are afraid of things that are bigger than them." she says, looking rather sad and worried. "Don't worry" you say, calmly, "Only really shallow people will act like that. Well, maybe everyone at first, but many people will get over it." "You don't understand!" she says, almost panicing, "I'll grow until I'm larger than this planet!"

Well, this was a revelation. Looks like your new friend will become planet sized eventually. "Well, I don't mind." you say, dully. There is a pause. then "Oh. Okay then." she says, calming down, "As long as my only earth friend doesn't mind, I won't either." She grins at you, then continues, "Besides, it might be fun to grow and grow into a gigantic person."

Suddenly, she starts to grow. She grows...

You were Indianna Jones, renowned explorer and whip cracking plus wise cracking your way across the world. Or so you wished. Your name was close( Ian , it starts with an I) and you were an archaeologist but no whips or cracks from you. You were not the stuff people fantasised about. At least those who fantasised wouldn't.

You were in South America on a trip where rumours of a hidden temple that had escaped detection over the centuries had been found by natives of the region. You had a guide who was a native on the land who spoke English fluently, also acting as a translator when needed. " So what do they say the temple is?' your guide asks you.

' Well from what the natives are saying its probably a temple dedicated to a goddess worshipped by the civilisation that built this." you tell him. " But I've heard it could be a prison for some unspeakable evil that terrorised the land." said the guide. ' Oh it could be that too, we'll both find out what it is and if there is anything inside the building." you reply.

You finally see it, the lost temple is on the horizon and getting bigger by the second. " That should be the temple, looks unknown enough to be one. " you say to Pele. " It should be, it's on the map drawn by the natives of the area. " he replied. You were loving this moment, the first person to step inside a place ignored by time.

The boat docks with land , Pele and you get out. " Anything I should know before going in?" said Pele. ' There might be booby traps so don't be surprised if we trigger one." you answer his question. Both of you walk to the temple, it's intimidating due to the aura of mystery and there seems to be the prescence of something powerful.

You can feel it, something godly and powerful resides in the area, whether it approves of you entering the temple is something you have no clue to.

Even though you expected traps to be triggered, somehow you avoided any of them and reached what must have been the worship room in the temple. " So this is where they worshipped the Goddess" Pele asked, he was spot on about it. You nodded as he had noticed the stone statute of a goddess in the centre.

" Perhaps we should find some artefacts to bring back?' Pele asked. ' Good idea but I think we should take a look around." you reply to Pele. Pele nods and searches the area for something they can bring back on the boat, the statute would have to be sent to a museum at a later time. You walk around the temple, light coming in through ancient windows built by the natives.

There are many strange markings on the walls of the room, it must have been some ancient language. It bore some resemblance to Olmec and Inca but it had its own touch of uniqueness to it.
