142131.content:
Original Author: Kardo

Pele calls you over, having found something. "I can read this part, it's written in just Inca, maybe it was for visitors to the temple when it was open." You look, and you see that he's right. You read it. "The goddess was sealed here, for fear of her power. She can only be released by the kindness of a mortal man, for kindness and joy are her food, and from which she gains power."

You see that Pele also read it, and he looks over at you. "Amazing!" you say to him, "This means that there was an entity they believed to be a goddess, perhaps a young woman." You say, looking back at the statue of the goddess. "Speaking of which, she looks like a Caucasian. So it would make sense for them to think that she was unnatural in some way." You walk over to the statue, you gaze upon her face. The craftsmen were amazing, her expression looked very kind indeed, which made you wonder why they'd seal her. Pele is obviously wondering the same, as you hear him mumble "Maybe they thought she would be angry with them or was trying to trick them somehow..."

Just being in the presence of the statue is starting to subtly affect you. You feel the stress of the journey draining from you, and you feel very calm. When Pele trips, you become much more concerned than you normally would, rushing over and asking if he's ok, then helping him back on his feet carefully. As you did this, you were certain you heard the statue creak, but that would be impossible. Pele helped you in the same manner when you tripped over the same spot while exploring the room, and again, the statue creaked.

"Ok, something weird is going on." you say, as you stand up. "We are not usually this calm or worried about each other. It's like the statue being there is making us act differently." Pele nods, having just wondered the same. "It feels like it's what we want to do, but at the same time our rational minds are questioning it." Pele says, brushing you off. Suddenly, the ground shakes slightly. You look around, making sure the place wasn't going collapse on you, when you notice the statue had moved off its pedestal.

"Uh... Pele?" You ask, as the statue starts moving toward you. "Is it just me or is the statue coming toward us?" His face pales as he looks over and sees the 15 foot statue coming towards you. As it came nearer, the stone began to fall off in pieces, revealing pale skin underneath. The statue stops as it comes up to you, and the final piece of stone falls off. The giant woman that was inside it looks down at you curiously. "Hello." she says, smiling gently.

You...
142131.title: You or Pele accidentally summon the Goddess.

choices: Tell her to take you home.
Direct her to a nearby lake; it's not safe.
1422.content:
Original Author: The Black Mamba

"This is the Tomb of Krain," Pele said as you approached a large, stone boulder with etchings arched on it. "It was named so after the etchings on this boulder that reads, 'Beware the power of Krain'".

You were curious, as the boulder had deteriorated badly, and could be easily moved. "Has anyone been inside?" you ask Pele.

"Not that I know of. No one knows what exactly is behind the stone boulder. Likely they are scared off by the warning."

Following your impulses, you dash to the boulder and push it aside. "Ian, I wouldn't go in there if..." you hear Pele's voice from behind, but the instant you step inside, you fall down a cliff. Landing hard on stone floor, you look ahead to see a young girl in green robes. It did not show any sign of being alive, yet it stood upright. You got up on your feet and took a step forward, and the chamber you were in pulsed with energy.

The girl blinked twice and spoke. "Thank you for releasing me from my prison," she spoke in a beautiful voice. The chamber pulses with energy again, and the girl seems to expand, growing taller before your eyes. Her robes shimmered as her head reaches the stone ceiling. The chamber pulses again, and the stone ceiling was removed, revealing a blue sky.

The girl continued to grow taller. She picked you up with her giant hand and made you stand on her palm. From below you see the ground grow farther and farther away, until it stopped altogether. The trees from below looked like moss. The girl looked you in the eye and spoke. "I am grateful for you granting me freedom. In return, you shall be my adviser. Your orders I obey."

A million questions came to your mind. What should you tell her to do?
1422.title: Freed from Her Prison

choices: You get to the main chamber without facing any danger
A large figure looms above you
1423.content:
Original Author: rideau

Soon you can see the temple, standing out nearly 30 meters tall. You get a good vista of it, since there's little vegetation around. Suddenly, just as you're just 100 meters from the temple, absorbed in contemplating it, a livid Pelé grabs your shoulder - there's a nearly three meters tall carnivorous plant-like creature not far behind you.

You two run for your lives screaming at the top of your lungs, with Pelé running ahead like he was Usain Bolt. The guide rushes into the temple and begins pushing the heavy stone porch so he can close it as you run inside. The monster hits it fiercely with its heavy pincers, but fortunately the stone is very thick.
- Just what was that?
- Well, it seems the goddess was worshipped to ask for protection from monsters. But I didn't expect it to be like this.
- This is already a big discovery, but I wonder if we will survive to tell it. If there's another creature like that inside the temple I'm afraid we're finished.
1423.title: Scram, Scram, Scram, Scram, Scram!

Non-human Giantesses: Giantess ghosts, angels, and other almost- or former human women.
145.title: Other

1451.content:
Original Author: Kardo

You walk into the room. It was up to you to work on the project, since everyone else didn't believe it would work. You've shown them wrong, but now they seem... afraid of your creation. Or maybe they're afraid of you, because you succeeded. Whatever it is, you find yourself alone with your creation more than you are around people.

You walk up to her. She's still small, but who knows how much she'll grow.

She is, of course...
1451.title: Science, what hast thou done?

choices: She grows instantly, becoming larger and larger.
She simply smiles, growing a foot taller.
14511.content:
Original Author: Kardo

You named her "Flora," as you were unable to come up with anything cleverer. She looked like an adult woman, except for her completely green skin and hair, and the odd leaf or two. She looked like she was wearing a bikini, but on closer inspection it's obvious that it was actually composed of leaves.

She looks up at you as you walk in. She smiles when she sees you, and stands up.

It is at this point that you realize that she might be a bit stronger than you last thought. She towers over you, easily 7 feet tall. When you last saw her, she was about 3 feet tall. This is especially bizarre as the room was still dark. You were going to introduce her to sunlight today, and see how it affected her.

You walk over to the level used to open the roof to let in sunlight. You hesitate, wondering what will happen when you open it. Flora looks at you happily, wondering what you're doing. She has not been able to speak, but that comes as no surprise to you, since plants are not known for vocalizing.

You steel your resolve, and flip the lever. The roof opens up. You turn around and look at Flora. She stares up at the opening roof, open-mouthed. She had never seen the sun before, after all. The ray of light reaches her and...
14511.title: A plant woman.

choices: She grows out before the shutters close and keeps them ajar
The shutters close, and she attempts to force them open
145111.content:
Original Author: Peter the Great

Her size increase is astounding. Her growth far exceeds any estimate you could have placed photosynthetic assistance at. You can even see the physical change in her height, as in seconds, she grows one inch... then two... then four... then seven... even her growth rate is speeding up rapidly. You quickly flip the switch and wince as you see the painfully slow shutters in the ceiling begin their process of closing. Was she going to grow through them first, or were the shutters going to close first? You couldn't tell.

A small, unscientific part of you realized that both sides had their benefits as you eyed the growing curves of her body, but you quickly pushed that away for now, and prayed for the result that was *technically* right. Her growth was still speeding up, and the shutters were almost closed...
145111.title: Sweet Mother Nature...

choices: No, and she gently picks you up as she begins to grow again!
Yes, and she sits down in the lab while you comfort her.  *
Yes, and she begins to grow again
1451112.content:
Original Author: infinity421

You breath a sigh of relief as, finally, the agonisingly slow shutters slam shut just as Flora's head collides with them. It was fortunate that they closed in time, you didn't even want to think how big she could have gotten if her growth hadn't been interrupted. Flora, however, who must have been clearing twenty feet tall by now, looked almost... panicked?

She grasps at the shutters in her desperate attempt to photosynthesize, and begins to pull, the shutters budging slightly more with every second. You quickly run over to her almost house-sized form, and try to get her attention, hoping to calm her down from this growthlust.

Do you manage to get her attention?
1451112.title: The Shutters Close

choices: Flora starts to grow again once she's out of the city.
Flora heads for water to sate her thirst.
14511121.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

Try as you might, you couldn't manage to get her attention. Flora continues to pull at the shutters, desperate for the sunlight on the other side...or was it that she was feeling claustrophobic and wanted to get out of the facility? You note how her legs are bent at the knees and her head is against the shutters. The room wasn't built to comfortably hold a now nearing 30 feet tall plant girl like her, and she was running low on space. With sadness, you decide it time to end the experiment, and...destroy her. Surely, you shouldn't feel such pain in your heart over plant in the shape of a giant woman, right? Yes, she was your creation, she was almost like the daughter you never had...but she was just a human-shaped plant and nothing more...right?

The next sounds you hear give question to those thoughts, as you hear a female voice... "...O...pen... Pl...ease...w-want...out..." there was only one thing in the room even remotely female: Flora. Flora...was speaking? And not something random, but an actual, almost cohesive sentence? No...there was simply no way you could bring yourself to kill her. She was demonstrating sentience and sapience, feelings and intelligent thought!

...Sweet mother of mercy, what in God's name have you created?

Trying one more time, you scream Flora's name at the top of your lungs in the hopes of getting her attention. This time, she pauses and looks down towards you. "R-Rich...ard! M-my...cre...a...tor!" she says, still stumbling with the words. She's just learning how to speak now, but it's clear she's learning at an alarming rate. Perhaps the sunlight fuels her growth both physically and mentally? You don't want to open the shutters despite Flora's protests earlier, but she smiles brightly as she bends down and picks you up. She places you in between her massive cleavage, tightening her leafy bikini top so you wouldn't fall out from between her giant melons as she stands up again.

Flora now tries a different strategy than merely pulling on the shutters, as she wraps her fingers around the cables of the rusty old winch that operated the shutters and pulled on them, causing the old thing to finally break. You regret not getting around to replacing it with a newer, stronger winch, which would have also allowed the shutters to close much faster. Now no longer having any resistance to fight against her, Flora has no trouble at all pulling the shutters completely open...and breaking them in the process. "Sor...ry..." she apologizes, and the look in her green face appears to suggest she was genuinely sorry for breaking them.

Of course, now with the sun pouring on her and charging her chlorophyll for photosynthesis, Flora begins to grow...well, like a weed. She quickly becomes too big to fit in the room and she bursts out of the roof. Her expression is a mixed one: happy because she was free of the cramped space and you were still safe, and because she was growing as well; upset because she broke your laboratory's roof and she doesn't seem to enjoy doing so. "Sorry... a...gain..." she says as she quickly steps out of the now roofless lab before her growing body could destroy more of it. You feel her leafy bikini top slacken slightly as she fishes you out from between her breasts and into her hand. You guess her height to be at least 60 feet tall, and still growing.

You try to talk to her, and see if her intelligence and/or verbal skills are improving. You're still surprised that she can even speak at all, but you've come to realize that you've no idea what Flora is and is not capable of. "Flora? Why were you so desperate to open the shutters?" The plant girl replies, "M-many reasons... The sunlight...feels nice. When I was cut off...I...realized how small your lab had become to me... Felt...scared. I...wanted to...protect you. I...didn't want you hurt.

"Also...I enjoyed the growing. Feel...more like you the bigger I get. I feel smarter, more able to communicate with my creator in the same way you do to me."

Fascinating. It seems she is changing and becoming more intelligent the longer she's exposed to sunlight, albeit also making her grow at an incredible pace. She seems to pause for now at 100 feet tall and is carefully walking out of the city. You ask, "You don't enjoy destroying things, do you? You apologized when you destroyed the roof of my lab, and even stepped out before you could cause further damage." and Flora responds with, "No, not in the slightest bit. Destroying things intentionally is wrong, and would upset you. I don't want to hurt you or any other human...but I'd also like to not be chopped down if it's all the same to you, Richard."

You can't help but smile at Flora's joke, yet also amazed at how quickly she's picked up the concept of humor. It's entirely possible that she could become far more intelligent than any human that has ever lived, and possibly ever will, and soon. A being that was superior to humanity in nearly every way. If she could reproduce on her own, either sexually with a human or asexually...humanity could be in a lot of trouble, especially if her offspring were to be hostile or violent towards humans. And while you have no idea if she was capable of reproduction, thankfully Flora is very kind and gentle and has expressed a desire to not hurt anyone. Which was good, as she was like a daughter to you now.
14511121.title: Flora's growing like a weed.

choices: Flora seeks how she can help humanity at her increasing size.
The military seek to round her up, and force her to flee with you.
145111211.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

Flora's steps gave the city populace quite a scare as she passed, what with her being a 100 foot tall plant woman and all. Still, she seems to exude some sort of...aroma around her, close to the ground in particular. It's...pleasant, and not in a weird smell fetish way. Her aroma is very much like that of many flowers, sweet and soothing, yet not to the point of it being cloying. So as she passes through the city ever so carefully, occasionally either using her foot or bending down to gently move obstructions out of her path, her aroma delivers a calming effect to the people closest to her path.

"I'm glad the humans in the city seem to enjoy the scent of flowers. I'm not sure what else I could have done to make my presence more calming than frightening." Flora explains to you, and you're again surprised at her intelligence and problem solving skills, as well as her level of caring. Very little of this she had to do. She could just simply have ignored the people beneath her, and yet she made an effort to make them relaxed about a giant plant woman walking through their city on her way out. Yet you guess she's far from done growing, as her pace seems to quicken as much as she can safely.

Once well out of the city and away from any major traffic routes, you hear the leaves on Flora's body shake, although there's no wind. A smile crosses her face as she starts to grow again. "Time to surpass even the mightiest trees in size for me!" she says excitedly, and you know she means every word of it. 100 feet quickly gives way to 120, and then 140 is left behind to grace her prize-winning watermelon sized (proportionately) breasts for a moment before they too soar above the mark. She reaches 200 feet in a few moments, and then 300 feet shortly thereafter! A minor squeal of delight escapes the green giantess' lips as 500 feet soon becomes a distant memory.

You worry that Flora may be letting herself get carried away, so you yell at her, "FLORA?! HOW MUCH LONGER, HOW MUCH BIGGER ARE YOU GOING TO GROW RIGHT NOW?!" Your answer is soon delivered as she slows to a stop at about 1500 feet tall. She looks down at you and says, "This for now is fine. It was building up for some time now and I needed to hold it back to make sure no one in the city would be harmed. And once I was out, I needed to release it while I had the opportunity to do so safely." Flora pauses and then adds, "I would like to note, Richard, that you needn't yell at me. As large as I am, I can still hear you just fine if you're speaking at normal volume. I hear through my whole body, not just my ears." Never once does her smile leave her face. She's happy just being with you and explaining how unnecessary yelling at her was. She's part plant, after all.

As she stepped further away, you could see that the ground where Flora had been standing had been all turned and bulldozed about with her growth. However, it seems that with just a little work...that very same area would make for excellent, fertile land for whatever was planted there. Perhaps she could prove to be a farmer's greatest friend, or a help to end world hunger? It would be up to her in the end what she intends to do with herself, but instead of focusing on the potential threat her existence could pose, you like thinking of the ways she could help humanity. Certainly better than admitting her existence being the product of a very lonely, scientific mind with too much time on its hands...
145111211.title: Flora the green giantess

choices: A pair of F-22's approach, but quickly break off.
Flora decides to show her good intent to the city she came out of.
1451112111.content:
Original Author: Detective Barricade

It's not long before Flora speaks again, after having given you a look over. She says, "Color, and a lot of it..."

Curious, you ask, "What about color?"

Flora replies, "I've noticed that I...don't have much variation on my colors. I'm green, green, and more green. I'm aware that you may not have thought this far ahead about me, but wouldn't you think I would be considerably more appealing if I wasn't just all green?"

Your heart sinks. It's true, you hadn't thought this far ahead about Flora. But then, how could you have known she would soon become a 1500 foot tall incredibly intelligent and talking plant woman? Admittedly you would have been happy if she was at the size she was before you introduced her to sunlight, silent, and mostly just stood there looking pretty.

That isn't to say that you aren't happy with what she has become, and likely will continue to become, of course. You stutter back, "I-I'm sorry, F-Flora... P-perhaps t-there's something i-in my lab that could-"

To your surprise, Flora cuts you off by bringing a giant finger to her lips and says, "I wasn't asking you to do anything, silly! I was merely asking if you would be alright with me adding some color to myself? I'll take your response as a 'yes'."

With that, Flora seems to concentrate, and she begins to reveal more color. First is her leafy bikini, as the leaves turn into a beautiful mixture of the colors of autumn leaves. Next is her 'nails', which change in color to that of perfectly ripe strawberries. Then her lips change to the color of red rose pedals, and possibly as soft as them too. The color of her irises changes to blue like violets. The final change is to her hair, which turns pink like cherry blossoms. With her colors, Flora looks amazingly beautiful.

"How do I look now?" Flora asks with a smile.

"Amazing... But is there another reason for these colors other than wanting to not be all green?" you ask out of curiosity.

Flora nods and says, "Well, yes, actually. In addition to the aesthetical benefit, I'm hoping that by reducing the amount of exposed chlorophyll in my body I can slow down my body's growth, and possibly halt it altogether eventually. Granted, I believe I'll still reach roughly a mile or so in height before that happens at the very least.

"And it may also help me with what I would like to do, which is to help your kind!"

You're of course delighted to hear Flora say that. Again, she could just focus on herself, but instead she wishes to at least try to be a boon to humans.

Unfortunately, the military doesn't seem to think of her as harmless, as an Apache helicopter flies into her view and opens fire on her. She closes her hand around you protectively, and then lashes out on the helicopter. From your view within her hand, you see Flora catch the helicopter with her free hand by the tail gently, and then breathe some sort of pollen at it. The pollen seems to clog the weapons to the extent that they can't fire on her, yet doesn't come near the rotor or tail prop.

She glares at the pilot inside and says, "My name is Flora, and your attack on me has failed miserably. I do not, repeat, do not wish to harm anyone. However, I strongly suggest that you return to your base and inform your superiors that they should not seek to renew their attack. If they do, I will be forced to defend myself and the population closest to me from their misguided efforts, and I cannot guarantee your comrades' safety in that case." Her tone is not of anger, but of desperation and seriousness. She truly doesn't wish to inflict harm, but would regretfully defend herself and the nearby population if it came down to it.

Soon she asks that the pilot power down his aircraft, to which he has little choice but to comply. Once the rotors cease spinning, Flora gently places you on her shoulder and then sets the Apache down in her freed hand. She then informs the pilot that he may power up his helicopter again, as she had wanted to be certain he would have little trouble leaving once she let go. He complies, takes off, and leaves. After having watched this whole thing go down, you ask, "Are you alright, Flora? Do you think they'll get the message?"

Flora smiles warmly at you and replies, "I'm perfectly fine, Richard. Thanks for asking!" she then says with a slightly worried look, "Oh, they'll get the message alright. What I'm worried about is that they'll ignore it and try to attack me again."
1451112111.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. Flora is colorful

choices: The match flame becomes another fire woman!
14512.content:
Original Author: Kardo

You named her "Firey" because you are terrible at coming up with names. She was, basically, a sentient fire. Unlike other fires, though, she was able to burn without consuming fuel. She can be touched without burning yourself because of this.

She stands up as you walk up to her. Even without fuel, she's been slowly growing since she was created out of a tiny candle fire. She is now 6 feet tall, taller than you. You hypothesize that she has been slowly consuming the oxygen around her as fuel for growth, but have no proof. She opens her mouth, and emits a crackling noise, like a fireplace fire. You've come to recognize that she makes that sound when she's happy.

You came here for an experiment. You light a match, and hold it next to her. She reaches out and touches the flame and...
14512.title: A woman made of fire

choices: You to use more effective methods
To have some fun with you
145121.content:
A loud crackling sound which represented the sound of moaning escaped Firey's mouth as she grew another foot taller after absorbing the match's fire, almost hitting her head against the ceiling. She looked down at you from her towering height with delight and gratitude as her moaning and growth slowly subsided, and it was obvious from the look in her eyes that she was hungry for more, and you happily fulfilled her request.

With the both of you smiling brightly at each other, you gladly threw another match worth of fire into Firey, with another loud moan escaping her as she grew another foot taller.

The enjoyment the both of you were having only motivated you to literally keep fueling the fire. As she continued to rise higher and higher and burn brighter and brighter, so did the smile on her face, as well as yours.

But eventually you ran out of matches to feed to her, which at first came of as disappointing to you, until you realized how massive she's become because of the small matches you had fed to her. Your disappointment quickly turned into gratitude, as she was now so big that she was forced to lie down in order to avoid breaking through the ceiling.

Firey was lying down with her face right in front of you, It seems that she was very pleased to have someone like you to fuel her, as her smile was covering your entire view. The moment she touched the match the flame flared out into a large burst of fire. You instinctively let go of the match as most people would. As the match burned on the ground, it began to twitch and wobble. It's shape fluctuated until it took form of a second, smaller Firey.

She was laying down, seemingly asleep. She started stretching as she slowly woke up.

The second Firey slowly raised her head up. Looking at you, then to the original Firey. She smiled and made a few short crackles aimed at the smaller fire woman. Could she be communicating with her?

The small Firey was still dazed from just waking up, but seemed to understand. She looked back down and started to concentrate. Soon you felt a gust of wind as the newly-born fire woman quickly consumed a large amount of oxygen in the immediate area, using it as fuel to grow.

Purposely fueling their flames and controlling how much they use? This was an ability you had no idea about! In a few short moments, she was finally at an even height with the original Firey.

The two looked at you and and smiled making more crackles to note their happiness. They gave each other a quick hug and...

You blinked rapidly at this unexpected turn of events. You'd expected a small increase in constitution or power, certainly, but not an entirely separate being to be born. You watch as one of them bends over, looking with interest at the.. oh, no.

The box of matches you dropped on the floor.

You yell as the original reaches for the box, but it's too late. If the last match gave a flare up as it was touched, this box gives off a full-fledged little explosion scattering flames all over the lab. You barely have time to cover your ears as your little darling's crackle of flame becomes a roaring audience's chorus of fire across the entire room. Perspiration instantly erupts on your head- while one of them with no fuel was tolerable, a crowd of them now at various sizes burning up papers, chairs, tables, etc. was as hot as any other fire. You figure this has gone on far enough, and run out of the room, your original clapping her "hands" together rapidly with a big smile on her face... you assume she's delighted at all the friends she's made.

It kills you to say it, but you've got to get to the fire alarm. You promised you wouldn't let your judgment get in the way of your common sense.

You grabbed a rather large bowl that could be considered to be a small tub and began to fill it with water. You decided to play it safe and added about a foot of water into the bowl. You place it on the ground near the subject, which it looked at with curiosity. "Go on, get in," You said with encouragement. You had pen and paper in your hands as she barely managed to get a proper footing into the bowl. At last, she body was inside, but suddenly, she began to melt. You looked in shock and slight disappointment, your subject seemingly to have disappeared into the water with no signs of life.

Suddenly, the water began to rise as the subject began to take shape once more. She reached up to her original 3 feet, but shortly surpassed it. You looked on in joy as your subject quickly reached to a height of 4 feet and some odd inches. You quickly noted that the subject can grow whenever it is near water. The water woman looked happy to you and you couldn't help but smile back. She seem to have enjoyed the surge of water.

You decided to do another experiment as you walked over the sink and let it run. You urged the subject to come closer, and much to your amazement, it was actually walking. It was much better than the previous attempt. It reached to the sink and you put your hand underneath the running water, telling her to do the same. She does so and the results almost become immediate.

It reached a height of 5 feet in 30 seconds and soon another foot 30 seconds later. You turned off the facet and looked up at your new creation. It reached a height of 6'0" in a course of 5 minutes.

It looked down at you, still as happy as ever. Then a thought came over you that made you slightly worry. What would happen to her under the sun? Would she evaporate?

1451321.content:
Original author: ForestFire5000

Your creation was the world's most advanced robot; model number 5@R4, code named Sara. You had created a robot with all the functions of a real human; from real emotions to the ability to grow and mature with age. Of course, you had programmed her to stop aging once she reached 25, so she would always retain her beauty. Right now, you had started her off at the age of 10. A fairly young age with plenty of room for growth, but still fully capable of all the essential activities in daily life (ie: walking, talking, etc.).

You were simply amazed at how well she turned out. She had long blue hair that flowed almost all the way to her waist, and she had the most adorable face. She really looked just like a regular human girl. In fact, if not for her unusual hair color and doll-like joints, you were certain that nobody could possibly tell the difference. She even had real emotions like a girl 'her age' would, working nerve endings in her body to allow her to feel, and a fully functional digestive system. She truly was the world's most perfect robot.

As you approached her 'sleeping' body and gently shook her awake, her eyes opened with a flash as she smiled at you.

"Good_morning_daddy!_How_are_you_today?"

"I'm great Sara, how are you?"

"I_feel_great!_I_think_that_I_might_have_grown_a_bit_in_my_sleep!"
"Hehe, well then, why don't we measure you and find out?"

"Yay!_Thank_you_daddy!"

You and Sara walked over to a wall where you have been keeping track of her growth. Having her stand against the wall once again, you were shocked at the results: She had grown alright. She grew a whole 6 inches over night! You simply stared at your mechanical marvel in confusion. Sara looked up at you with an equally confused look on her face.

"What's_wrong_daddy?_Did_I_not_grow?"

"Oh no Sara, you grew a lot! I'm just surprised is all..."

"Really?_Yay!_I'm_gonna_be_a_big_girl_soon!"

"You sure are, Sara... Probably bigger than I ever imagined..."

"What?"

"Oh, nothing... Well, didn't you want to go shopping today?"

"Yippee!_Thanks_daddy!_I_love_you!"

"I love you too Sara..."

You and your robotic daughter then left the house to go shopping together.


The question is, will anything happen while you're out?

If she did notice, she either didn't react or didn't care.

You'd need to record this in your research log.

---


Subject Sara has also, on multiple occasions, expressed the desire to grow physically larger, indicating a possible correlation between desire for growth and the growth itself, as Sara's growth spurts often happen short periods of time after she expresses the desire to grow or be taller. As Sara is currently sleeping, I will measure any growth in the morning.

Saving the document on your computer before powering it down, you begin to wonder about Sara's rate of growth as you get into bed. Would it stay the same? Slow down? Maybe even speed up?

Your answer would come the following morning, when it was clear without the measuring tape that...

You named her "Eve", due to the fact that she was a one-of-a-kind creature: Being very curious, Eve stands at a measly 1ft, her orange fur covered her like armor to a knight.(Except for her underbelly, which was colored gray,) She could sheathe her claws like a cat. Her tail above her butt looked similar to that of a fox. The gills around her neck was covered by a scarf that you gave her.(Apparently, she's very self-conscious of them,) Her tiny fangs, although she's eaten meat before, made her look adorable. But the two weirdest things about your creation(Among the rest,) was that Eve had:
1. Wings that looked similar to a pterodactyl, which she could use as a second pair of arms.
And 2. Her yellow eyes, abit frighting at first, combined with her personality, made her in simplest layman's terms "A little girl in a monster's body."

"Daddy!", she said happily, her tail wagging like mad. "Good morning, Eve.", you calmly responded, abit with a chuckle. "Okay, girl. Let's see if you can learn some more words.", you told her as you released her from her cage. She rubbed against your leg. After she stopped, you picked her up and set her down on the table. "Okay. Ready, girl?", you asked her. Eve nodded vigorously. "Friend.", you said. "Fr-fr-fri-friend?" "Friend: Someone that you can count on, either at a tough time, or someone that you trust. Understand, Eve?", you asked her. Eve looked upwards for a few minutes, then nodded. She pointed at you. "Friend." "That's right, Eve.", you told her, abit with a smile.

This continued until suddenly.... accidentally

Original author: Danzilla

The chemicals fall on her!
145132211.title: You accidentally knocked over some chemicals!

choices: was clutching her head (She's getting smarter)
1451322112.content:
Original author: UltimateNeo

Eve yelps as the chemicals spill on her! "I'm so sorry, Eve!", you say to her as you quickly picked her up and head towards the bath.

As you were putting her in the bath, you noticed that she seemed a little bigger. "Must be my imagination.", you thought.


Unbeknownst to you, Eve was no only getting bigger, but.............
1451322112.title: She grows slowly

choices: Eve's growth continues its slow pace.
14513221121.content:
Original author: Detective Barricade

She was clutching her head. At first you thought that perhaps the chemicals had hurt her head where they had spilled, but Eve was holding her head in general, not one spot in particular. You asked with concern, "Are you alright, Eve?"

As soon as you said that, Eve nodded her head...though she seemed to be hanging onto your words a little more than she usually did. But you take her unspoken word for it, and she plays about in the bath. By the time you lift her out of the bath, noting how she somehow felt a little heavier than going in, you were just as wet as she was from her splashing and tail wagging. You put her back in her cage and set a blow dryer next to it to dry her off. Oddly, the cage seemed slightly smaller in comparison to her than earlier, but you ignore it and go to see just what it was you accidentally spilled on Eve while she happily flaps her wings and makes airplane noises in her cage.

You examined the now empty bottle of chemicals that you had accidentally spilled on Eve. It was a growth-inducement chemical, one that seemingly never actually worked. Although by the time you had gotten Eve to the bath tub, the chemical had been all but completely absorbed into her skin and fur, so there hadn't been much to actually try and wash off her... You decided to take a nap, as Eve proved to be quite the hardy little creature and should be just fine with the blow dryer until you woke up.

Half an hour passed, and your sleep was disturbed by something furry tickling your nose. As you woke up, you couldn't hear the blow dryer running anymore. But when you opened your eyes finally, you were staring straight into an 18 inch tall Eve's yellow cat-like eyes. "Hi, daddy!" she said happily with a big grin from the pile of books she was standing on. This was definitely strange, for she never demonstrated being able to let herself out of her cage even though the door was relatively easy to open. But the extra 6 inches she had gained since the accident are a more pressing concern.

You had predicted that Eve would eventually grow, perhaps to 4 or 5 feet at most, but it would be slow. This however wasn't natural...as natural as Eve in of herself was. Still, you reassured her as you said, "Hello, Eve! How did you get out of your cage? Did you let yourself out?"

Even nodded happily, apparently quite pleased with herself, and replied, "Yep! I let myself out! Make daddy proud of me! ...Is daddy proud of me?"

You're slightly startled with her using some words you hadn't taught her yet, but you didn't want to upset her and said, "Of course I'm proud of you, Eve! I think it's time we picked up where we left off with teaching you words. ...Though you seem to have picked some up already."

Eve cheered, and you hefted her up onto the table...making sure nothing was close to her that could be spilled on her. A more difficult task now that she was 18 - no, 19 inches tall now. She had grown another inch.

To your surprise, Eve very quickly repeated back much of the words you attempted to teach her. There was no way she should know what half of these words even mean. Unless... You tickled her tummy and she brought her arms forward as she laughed, revealing a thick book in one hand. You read the title and discover that it was a dictionary. And she was 3/4 of the way through it. Eve looked at you with eyes that showed she knew she had been caught, and she admitted, "I got bored, so I started reading. ...Is daddy mad at me?"

You said to her reassuringly, "No, I'm surprised that you're reading a dictionary. That has a lot of big words in it, Eve. Maybe you should try the books I had set out for you later?"

Eve giggled and jumped down from the pile, and then pointed at the set of Mr. Man and Little Miss series of books at the very bottom - the very same books you had set out for her. She replied, "Already read them, daddy! At first they were hard, but they quickly became easy! I even started reading several of them at a time and it was still too easy!"

Just then she shuddered and grew to the height of 2 feet tall. Her body had also began to make the human in her a little more apparent proportionately speaking. If that continued... You excused yourself and bought a blue swimsuit for her to wear, thankfully open in the back so her wings had room to be there, and then had her put it on. It was of course quite loose fitting right now, but she would grow into it.

Eve said in response to the swimsuit, "Ooh...the blue looks pretty with my orange fur! You're the best daddy ever!"

You looked at her with joy and responded, "Aw, thanks, Eve! You're such a good girl!"

"And soon to be the BIGGEST girl ever!" Eve shouted with glee.

You raised an eyebrow and said, "Oh really? Well keep dreaming, short stuff. You've got a long way to go for that lofty dream."
14513221121.title: Smarter AND cuter than Monzie.

choices: Eve suddenly grows another foot taller!
145132211212.content:
Original author: Detective Barricade

You watched as Eve removed the swimsuit bottom and then unsheathed the claws in her left hand. At first you were worried she was going to tear it apart, but instead she simply made a large enough incision in the back for her tail to poke out comfortably. After, she got her hands on some thread and sewed some reinforcements around the hole she made. You wondered where she learned to sew so quickly and seemingly so expertly, but sure enough your copy of Sewing for Dummies was among the pile of books she had read.

It was clear that Eve's intelligence had skyrocketed over the past 45 minutes since the accident. She had learned far more in just this short amount of time than you had even hoped to teach her over her lifetime. Even human children didn't learn this quickly, and you had the admittedly scary prediction that her intelligence would soon match your own - and then exceed it. And with her increasing size and strength to go with it, you couldn't help but wonder what would happen to you once she had learned everything she possibly can from you.

You couldn't kill her for two reasons. The first was that you could bring yourself to harm Eve about as easily as you could if she was your biological daughter, which was to say not at all. The second, and one that alarmed you at first, was that she was about as resilient as the King of Monsters in those Japanese kaiju movies himself: Godzilla. So you could only hope that Eve remained the same sweet, gentle, and curious girl she had been before the accident.

15 minutes later, and not a peep from Eve, you began to go look for her to see where the little furry orange bundle of joy had gotten off to. It didn't take long, and to your shock, she was going over your experimentation notes on her! "Eve, what are you doing? Those are highly sensitive notes!" you said to her.

"I know, daddy. But they're your notes on me, so I thought it would be alright if I read 'em! I'm done reading them anyway." Eve replied, setting the notes down on the desk and then walking past you. She stopped for a moment as she compared her height to yours, and then ran off with her tail wagging in excitement. Since you last saw her, she had grown another foot taller. This brought her height to 3 feet tall. She had also gained the slightest hints of breasts beneath her swimsuit top...

Lunch time rolled around, and you had prepared some raw meat for Eve. You didn't always give her meat, but today it seemed like she could use some food for her growing brain...and you still felt bad about spilling those chemicals on her. However, she didn't seem interested in eating it when she discovered it was still raw. Normally she wouldn't complain, but today she asked, "Daddy? Could you cook my meat please?"

You shrugged and took the hunk of steak away to cook it while Eve watched with utter fascination. As per her increased intelligence, she was smart enough to keep her limbs away from the hot elements even if they more than likely wouldn't burn her. Once the steak was cooked and handed back to her, she began to dig in. She was confused as to why the inside was still pink, but you informed her that this was fine and even preferable with steak. "Bacteria can't get into a solid hunk of meat as easily as ground up meat like in a hamburger patty, so it's okay if it's a little pink on the inside. In fact, humans typically prefer it this way so it's easier to chew. Otherwise it becomes like trying to chew on a hockey puck or rock."

Afterward, Eve happily ate the cooked steak and then proceeded to help put the dishes in the sink. She helped herself to a glass of milk and giggled at the milk mustache left on her face before wiping it off. Against your better judgment, you agreed to let her play on your computer. It wasn't something you had ever let her do before, but then before today she had just been learning a few words a day and even then they didn't always stick. While she was doing that, you folded up her now too small cage and put it away. You didn't want her to be uncomfortable, she had already figured out how to open nearly any door that didn't have a lock on it, and you trusted her to not use the couch as a scratching post.

2 hours passed, and you had fallen asleep while watching TV. Once again, you found your sleep disturbed, only this time by Eve calling for you. You refused to get up, but she simply pulled you by the arm until you fell out of the couch and onto the carpeted floor. Finally, you responded, "Alright, what is it...Eve?"

Your eyes went wide with shock. Eve was now 6 feet tall, and had the proportions of a young woman. Slender limbs that belied the strength behind them, a model's hourglass shape, a somewhat large yet seemingly firm butt, and a large set of breasts that tested the limits of her swimsuit top. Her tail was seemingly silky soft as well, and the fur around the top and back of her head had changed into shoulder length hair. Even her face had matured into something beautiful, yet retained her small fangs, her nose that started like a human's but ended like a dog's, and her cat-like yellow eyes. "Hehehe! I've grown! A lot!"

You managed to stand up, and were now staring Eve in the eyes straight on. Finally, you said, "So I've noticed... I should probably make notes about this, if you'll excuse me..."

Eve smiled and replied, "There's no need, daddy. I've already written them down if you want to read." she then asked, "Um...is it okay if I keep referring to you as daddy? I can call you by your name, Adam, if you'd like..."

You replied, "No no, daddy is fine, Eve."
145132211212.title: Eve's a big (monster) girl now!

choices: Eve outgrows the house before she can get out.
1451322112121.content:
Original author: Detective Barricade

Eve handed you the notes she had taken on herself, then stretched her wings and sat down on the floor to watch the TV with her tail wagging.

While she watched, and very quickly figured out the remote to change channels, you sat on the couch to read. You were expecting messy scribbles, since you hadn't yet taught her how to write or print, but to your surprise her notes were very neatly written. There were also no spelling errors to be found whatsoever in her notes.

"Entry #24601:

"Attempted to teach subject more words, including friend. Subject had difficulty at first, but soon caught on. Appears to be very eager to learn and happy to see me.

"Disaster! Subject was accidentally subjected to some chemicals carelessly left around. Subject was taken to the bath in an attempt to wash off the chemicals, but much of them had already been absorbed through her fur and skin. Subject was clutching her head after, albeit briefly. Chemicals were old growth inducers that had failed to work before.

"Subject woke me up precisely one half hour after the accident, after having grown 6 inches taller, having let herself out of her cage. Discovered subject has read through all the books set aside for her, and has moved on to reading far more difficult books and even a dictionary. Apparently her intelligence has increased significantly. Subject then grew another 6 inches, and gained somewhat more recognizably humanoid proportions. Have bought her a blue swimsuit in the event this trend continues.

"Subject continues to grow rapidly, both physically and mentally. It is possible that her intelligence may soon match, and even exceed, my own. Discovered subject going through my notes on her, already having finished reading them, and having grown another foot taller. Subject is now 3 feet tall, and thus no longer suitable for her cage. Has also started to show signs of puberty in humans: she has gained small breasts.

"Subject has shown an intriguing development: she has asked for cooked meat, no longer satisfied with raw meat like she has been previously. Have explained the benefits of not thoroughly cooking steak and how bacteria cannot easily penetrate it versus ground meat when asked. Have agreed to allow her access to my computer, though I fear I may be alarmed of what I may find in the recent history..."

You paused, marveling at how thorough Eve had been, even replicating how you would have written the notes up to this point. You made a mental note to follow up on her 'suggestion' and check your computer's recent history later. Eve turned her head towards you and happily said, "Do you like it, daddy? You should really check out the end. Sorry if I didn't write that part like you would have."

You reassured Eve that you were getting there, and then read the last part. It was indeed different from the rest, but you read on anyway.

"Note: I, Eve, subject of these notes, have written this part as myself. If my father, Dr. Adam Trestler, disapproves of this, I am deeply sorry.

"Over the past hour and 50 minutes, I have undergone a tremendous growth spurt. I have doubled my previous size, and am now 6 feet tall. The rest of my body appears to have gone through human puberty, as my measurements include a 40 inch bust, a 28 inch waist, and 38 inch hips. If I were to estimate, I would predict that I would take a 40D-cup bra currently. The fur around the top and back of my head, excluding my ears, has grown out into shoulder length hair. I look like a 20 year old woman, and an attractive one at that. (minus my monster features, of course) My intelligence since this morning has skyrocketed to an unknown degree, and I fully believe myself vastly more intelligent than my father. And quite possibly more intelligent than any human how has yet lived. I believe he fears this of me, and what I would do to him once I can no longer learn anything from him, but to me he is still my father, and I love him at least as much as he does me. I will never harm him, and do my best to not harm any other human as well.

"Going over my father's notes, I hypothesize that the growth inducement chemicals I was introduced to by accident only affect those with the XX chromosome. Perhaps the Y chromosome somehow neutralizes it, or has something missing for the chemicals to react to? I bring this up because I fear my growth has only just begun. I'm certain that my size will only continue to increase over time, although my intellect remains unknown. I received a perfect score on an online IQ test, so I have no idea how much further my intelligence can go. One odd property of my growth, which I suspect will continue as I get bigger, is that the scarf (to hide my gills, which I am self-conscious over) and swimsuit my father gave me have grown with me, though my breasts and buttocks have tested the limits of what the fabric of the latter can contain, as it was never made for a human with quite my figure in mind. Only time will tell what other properties will surface as I grow."

You sat back, stunned. Eve had full admitted her superior intellect, but also a desire not to harm you, and a strong one at that. Just then, Eve's body began to shudder violently, and she grew 3 feet taller, putting her at 9 feet tall. "I...don't think I can stay in here anymore, daddy. I'm sorry, but I have to go out into the world, or my body will rip the house apart with its growth." she said sadly. You nodded and led her outside. She paid attention to duck at each door way.
1451322112121.title: You go over Eve's notes.

Original author: Kardo

In these storylines, ghosts can touch people/objects, and can be touched by people/objects and are not transparent. However, they can also go through walls, float, disappear and reappear, and cause spooky things to happen. They are friendly and kind, but are often rather dark and morbid, and sometimes mischievous.

So which ghost are we going with?
14521.title: Ghost

choices: She suddenly grows a little bit!
145211.content:
Original author: Detective Barricade

You're rather excited for your date tonight. You met Lily on an online dating service, and she's quite the looker. Long, flowing white-blonde hair; grey eyes; generous curves...but she seems a little pale. Still, it could have been the lighting... But she agreed to come over to your place for the date, as she claims that she and public locations don't mix so well.

You clean yourself up and try to set up a welcoming mood in your home. Then you sit down and wait patiently for 7:00, the time Lily said she was coming over. Yet 7:00 rolls around, and there's no sign of a car approaching your driveway or anything to suggest Lily was actually coming. By 7:30, you're just about ready to accept that you had been stood up and that she isn't coming. You check your email to see if she sent you any updates about tonight that you might have missed, but there's nothing of the sort.

Suddenly, the power starts flickering wildly. Then comes an odd chill, even though it's a warm evening tonight... Finally, a feminine voice whispers in your ear with a slight giggle, "So. When do we get started?"

You turn your head to the source of the whisper and yelp in fright at being unexpectedly having company so close. Normally, you enjoy a good scare every now and again. But this is ridiculous! Once you regain your senses, you see that the whisperer is none other than Lily! She seems to be a good 6'10" to 7 feet tall, quite a bit taller than you. She's wearing a black tee shirt with the image of a ghost inside of a red crossed out circle - a Ghost Busters shirt. She's also wearing tight-fitting blue skinny jeans, albeit a bit faded. And she's also laughing her head off.

"Oh, that was too funny! You should see the look on your face. You looked like you were about ready to jump outta your skin!" Lily says as she calms down from her fit of laughter.

You stumble to find words. You're aroused by her height, but still spooked by her sudden appearance in your house. You didn't hear her come in, you didn't hear a car pull into your driveway, so how did she get inside? "H-how d-did you manage t-to...?" you begin.

Lily sighs and the power restores in full. "...Get in? Through the door, duh. I'd say that you look like you've seen a ghost, but I already know the answer." she replies.

"I-I've seen a ghost?" you ask in confusion.

"Um...yes. Yes you have. In fact...you're kind of looking at her right now. I'm...well, dead." Lily answers with a hint of sadness. She then picks up and looks at your TV remote out of curiosity.

Well that explains the pale complexion... Still, Lily seems friendly enough. "Wait. If you're a ghost...how can you be touching my remote? And isn't a Ghost Busters shirt kind of ironic for a ghost?" you question, slightly suspicious.

To this, Lily giggles slightly and responds, "What, this old thing? I was wearing this when I was murdered. College shootout. Luckily I was the only death, my classmates were injured but lived. My killer though... The guy goes and puts a bullet into his own head! Why didn't he just do that first? Would have saved me from this fate, and a whole lot of heartache...

"And I can touch your remote because I wanna touch it. If I don't wanna touch something, then I just pass right through it. Can't say I've tried making something I'm holding onto pass through another object with me yet though..."

You feel quite sorry for Lily and try to comfort her with a hug. She feels...unexpectedly warm. And substantial. But her condition does intrigue you, so you ask, "I don't mean to be rude or anything, but...what's it like being a ghost?"

Lily answers, "Aside from the admittedly fun things I get to do? Not all that much different from being alive. Granted, I don't need to eat, and most of what I do eat just falls to the floor right through me... And I don't even need to watch my weight anymore! The sucky part comes with the knowledge that you're basically stuck here forever. When the Sun goes nova in a few billion years and turns Earth and whatever bugs still gnawing at old bones of humans long dead into extra crispy ice balls, you'll still be around to watch it. Not even popcorn to enjoy the show.

"Still, the GA meetings are kinda fun."

"GA meetings?" you wonder.

"Ghosts Anonymous. The Headless Horseman founded it once he got tired of his spooky act to help fellow spooks cope with being undead and even how to blend in with the living. Though I still feel for some of these people. Like Serena for instance. 6 years old when she succumbed to a completely curable disease had it been caught in time." Lily responds as she starts flipping through channels.

You consider asking Lily about her height when...
145211.title: Lily, a 20 year old murder victim

choices: Lily grows again, and more than before.
Lily stays her current height for the time being.
1452111.content:
Original author: Detective Barricade

Suddenly, Lily starts to grow! It only lasts for a few seconds, but she gains a few inches from this spurt. Naturally, her attire keeps up with her, having been what she had worn when she was murdered. You estimate her height now to be about 7'3", and she seems...almost pleased with this. The smile fades quickly though as a look of slight embarrassment replaces it.

"So my gigantism follows me even in undeath? Ho boy..." Lily says with embarrassment, and then explains, "Yeah, I had a case of gigantism when I was alive. That's where my body grows larger than it should normally. In my case, I was still growing even after my 20th birthday. Although...my clothes always fit me just fine if I grew when I was wearing them. Even my shoes. Doctors warned that my condition might just kill me. Heh. Guess I don't have to worry about that anymore, do I?"

You respond with, "So if there's no threat of dying from this...how big do you think you'll get?"

Lily shrugs her shoulders and admits nonchalantly, "I dunno. Really, really, big? I might have ended up breaking the record for the tallest person in history had my life not been ended too freaking early, so...probably at least big enough to cover a small city with my foot? Actually, that sounds kinda cool. It'd scare the people there almost to death. Fortunately for them, I'd never allow myself to crush anything and instead just pass right through everything. It's not like there's anything I or they can do about it..."

"So what's with the smile when you grew just now? I thought ghosts couldn't really feel anything?" you ponder.

Lily answers with, "Hollywood misconception. We ghosts can feel. Usually cold. And light. In my case, my growth always felt weirdly pleasurable. And still does. Not as nice as when I was living, but still."

You're not sure what to think. Lily still seems like a nice girl, and you admit seeing her gigantic is rather...arousing, but she's also a ghost. She's unlikely to age past 20 years old, while you'll...

"Let me guess. You're thinking about how it won't work between us. I'll stay looking like a young woman while you'll grow old and die. I can tell you though that death won't part us if you're considering proposing or something." Lily says, almost like she's reading your mind, and then continues, "I'll also accept just friends too. Though if you want, I could assist in helping you join the undead...just saying."

Creeped out, you respond, "Will you cut that out? Are all ghosts so morbid?!"

Lily smiles slightly and says, "What can I say? I have no life. Get it? No life? Okay, sorry, that was lame. Actually, I'm trying to hold back. Though Death himself? He's a real teddy bear for someone who's little more than a walking robed and hooded skeleton..."
