"I need your help," you say to him. "Convince the city that I won't harm them."

"How could you evading harming an entire city, much more than five farmers?" he replies.

"I'll stay outside the city if I must. Get them to believe me."

Transportation by a woman 5 miles tall wasn't the best method, but he could do nothing but agree for the safety of his own life. Yet he seemed calm. Looking closer at his face, you notice he was the same farmer you ordered him to bring you the baskets of apples. He seemed like a courteous gentleman.

"I'll try... as long as I don't get the shirt pocket treatment," the farmer says.

"What's your name?"

"Kris. Kris Johnson. And what shall I call you? The Mile-High Woman? The Colossal Chick?"

He called me a woman and a chick, you think. You remembered Bonum. "The wish has multiple meanings," she said. You supposed she made you grow old and grow taller. Multiple meanings indeed. But you were only 8-years old. How will you adjust to the real world, which was full of hatred and discrimination?

"Call me Daisy," you say to Kris.

"Daisy... that's ironic," Kris says, trying not to laugh. "We should get moving."

"Got it."

The clouds above you were starting to thin, so you stood up to your full height and moved at full walking speed. You are unaware that you were making the farmers deaf. Finally you reached the city. Screams and calls for help came immediately as you stood by the city line. The city wasn't as big as the major cities of the United States, as you were as tall as it was wide. But it was overpopulated. The tallest skyscraper was slightly taller than your big toe. And even your toes could flatten nearby buildings.

Forgetting about the other farmers, you set Kris down to tell the public that you won't hurt anyone. You didn't hear the entire conversation, but when you picked up Kris again, he told you that they can't trust you. They said you could flatten the city in minutes.

"Which means, little or no food for you," he continues.

"Let me think..." you reply. After a couple of minutes you reply...
15322.title: Titanic Tourist

153222.content:
Original Author: The Black Mamba

"Someone? Who?"

You didn't hear him. Instead you felt kicking inside your shirt pocket. You pulled out the four farmers gasping for breath, all of them sick from sudden movements. "I am SO sorry," you apologized, and set them down near Kris. Then you took off, running to who-knows-where. You needed to find Bonum.

In the middle of the field where you woke up in, you hear a voice, as cold as death. "She's the one."

"Bind her," spoke another.

Instantly the area around you went dark. Pitch-black, smoky substance surrounded you. You couldn't move an inch. It's almost as if an unknown evil from a distant world was sent to depress and destroy you. You, the newborn titan, felt weaker than ever. You were about to cry.

Then what happens?
153222.title: Ambush

154.content:
Original Author: infinity421

Just who is this growing girl?
154.title: Kindness Growth

155.content:
Original Author: The Black Mamba

Conquest Growth: With everything a woman takes control of she grows larger, the rate depending on the size of what she claimed.

Word Trigger Growth: Every time a woman hears a certain word, she grows slightly taller.
155.title: More choices

1551.content:
Original Author: The Black Mamba

Who will be the conqueror, anyway?
1551.title: Conquest Growth

choices: Your little sister snatches the remote from your hand
Your mother hijacks you from the recliner to watch a TV program
Your older sister unplugs the TV to hook up her stereo
15512.content:
Original Author: The Black Mamba

You're in your house, sitting in the recliner, watching a movie. It was a summer afternoon, so you had almost everything to yourself. At the moment, at least.

You thought nothing can ruin your perfect lazy afternoon, until...
15512.title: Growth in the Family

155121.content:
Original Author: infinity421

Suddenly, the remote is yanked out of your hands by your little sister, who begins to channel surf. Letting your hand slump downwards, you turn to your sister and glare at her. Unfortunately, your little sister was staring at the TV screen, and snuggling into you slightly, despite the heat.

Before we continue the storyline, how old is your little sister?
155121.title: Your little sister snatches the remote from you...

1551211.content:
Original Author: infinity421

Your sister clearly isn't looking at you so you stop glaring at her, turning your attention to the channels she cycles through. While your sister truly was gentle and kind, she had developed a habit of snatching items without asking for them first. You couldn't stay mad at her for very long, though, as she was extremely cute, and looked up to you as a role model, meaning any bad behaviour on your part could end up influencing her.

Your sister leans into you again, and you realise that she was wearing her bright pink swimsuit. Maybe she was going to swim before she nicked the remote? Come to think of it, she seems a bit bigger than she was yesterday. She must be going through a growth spurt.

Suddenly, you hear a soft creaking, stretching noise, and see your sister slowly inch upwards, growing slowly, stopping when she has ballooned up to four foot even.

Your sister pauses her channel surfing, and examines herself. Does she notice the growth, or does she remember always being this big?
1551211.title: Your somewhat snatchy six year old sister

15512111.content:
Original Author: D-man72

(Since the other option seems to be her noticing her growth, this option will have her not noticing her growth.)

She looked over her self for a second... But then she goes back to flipping through channels, as if she had not grown at all. You look at her a moment before shaking your head, thinking you were just seeing things. You suddenly feel the cushion being pulled out from behind you. You look back at your sister now with the cousin, just in time to see another one of her growths. She slowly swells up to four foot ten! You couldn't believe your eyes, but it just happened in front of you, your sister grew from taking your cushion. You get up and leave the room to splash some water on your face to try to relieve yourself of this. When you come back you see your sister...
15512111.title: She (does not) notice the growth

choices: Eight and a half feet tall!
15512112.content:
Original Author: infinity421

Your sister quickly looks herself over, patting a few different areas while somehow not noticing that she was now just over seven inches taller than she had been minutes ago. Seeing her confused expression, you decide to investigate.

"Uh, sis? You okay?" You ask. Your sister halts her pat-down and rubs her tummy. "No, I feel all wierd from this really long growth spurt..." Her stomach growls loudly.

She leans over to her right, resting her head on the arm of the sofa. Before you can react, her larger hand shoots out past you, stealing onecushion, then another, your sister now resting her head on them as she groans and hiccups.

Your sister begins to stretch out bigger again, her whole body slowly growing from her thievery of two cushions. Her expression gradually changes from very uncomfortable to extremely happy as she passes five foot even and continues to grow, steadily taking up more and more room as her swimsuit creaks and groans loudly.

She leans into you as her head rises even higher, the once small and sweet six year old now monstrously tall for her age. Her growth finally halts, leaving your sister, who was a first grader, five feet and sev- no, five feet and nine inches tall. In the course of less than five minutes, your sister had grown from three foot four to five foot nine, three inches shorter than your height of six foot, and would almost definitely grow more as the day passed.

Your sister quickly snugs up to you, swimsuit moaning as her body defied what you were sure was a very large part of biology to fill it completely. Seeing as she has lost interest in the telly, you retrieve the stolen remote and begin to look for something you will find interesting. Turning you your not-so-little sister, you ask her, "Are you okay, sis? I mean, with the growth spurt and all..."

She hugs you tighter and nods. "I know! My tummy feels wierd but whenever it gets too bad it just means I'm going to get even bigger, and I want to be the biggest person ever!"

There is a flash of motion, and you realise that your sister has yet again pilfered the remote off you. Gulping, you feel her pressing into you more and more as she starts to grow to heights that most fully-grown adults would find envious...

How big does she get?
15512112.title: She remembers being big

155123.content:
You sunk into the recliner as you were becoming immersed in the movie. Just as the hero was about to deliver a witty one liner the television went blank. You heard your older sister grunt as she pulled the the plug from the socket.

"What are you doing!?" You propped yourself up on the recliner.

"Plugging in my stereo, what does it look like?" She replied snarkily.

"I was watching a movie!" You whined indignant, climbing off of the recliner.

"Yeah, I saw that stupid movie, I don't care what you're watching. I've got to practice my routine."

Your sister had been practicing ballet since she was a child. You would never admit it but she was actually really, really good at it. "Practice somewhere else you moron!" You said as you squared up to your sister, towering over her by a foot. Despite outgrowing your older sister you were still weary of her. Her short 5'1 figure was packed with muscle. Years of dancing and activities meant that she was ridiculously strong for her size, she had even started frequenting the gym and doing weights recently.

You on the other hand were a long distance runner in your school, tall and long. Not really weak, but you didn't really want to test your sisters strength.

"Yeah, well this is the biggest room in the house and you watching a stupid movie isn't going to be tested in front of an audience." She huffed at you.

'Is this worth it?' You questioned yourself. She always got her way in the end usually, this stuff was always a war of attrition and she is always stubborn.

"You know what? Fine take the damn room, I'm gonna go play some video games." You said brushing her off and walking passed her, to the door.

You heard a weird creaking some from behind you as you reached the door way and turned to look at your sister. She was standing with her arms crossed and hip cocked to one side, taking her for impatiently.

Was her shirt showing a bit of her toned stomach before? Man her shirts were tight, how was she even comfortable practicing in those? She shot a glare at you, pushing those thoughts from your mind and continuing to leave.

When do you next bump into your sister?
155123.title: Your older sister unplugs the TV to hook up her...

choices: Your mom surprises your sister with her favorite dessert
You find out your sister had stolen your headphones later in the night
1551231.content:
After playing games for a few hours the call for dinner rang out through the house. You were surprised how quickly time had flown by but realized you were actually feeling pretty hungry.

You went down to help set the table up when you bumped into your sister emerging from the bathroom toweling off her hair. "Watch out." She snipped at you despite having loads of room. You ignored what she said but couldn't shake the feeling something was different about her. As she closed the door to her room behind her you continued downstairs.

You set the table while your mother was dishing all the components of dinner into serving containers. She usually did this so that everyone could grab seconds if they wanted it. Just as everything was laid out your sister arrived in the doorway. "Roast chicken! I'm glad you made a lot, mom. I'm starving!" She happily said as she took a seat and immediately started dishing up a huge portion.

You and your mother took your seats and also began dishing up dinner while your sister dug in.

After a few minutes both your sister and you had cleaned your plates and were going for seconds. There was one half of a chicken left. You reached for the leg as you couldn't possibly finish the whole half but before you could get to it your sisters arm shot out and snatched it from beneath you.

"Hey!," you said, "I was only going to take the leg!"

"Yeah, well I'm taking the whole thing! Unlike some people I actually expended some energy today. Ans i need the protein, not like you need to build any muscle." She snidely said.

You opened your mouth to reply when your mother cut in. "I don't want to hear another argument between you two!" She cut the argument abruptly, "Let your sister have the seconds, she need to be ready for her performance. If you're really hungry you can cook some of the chicken in the fridge."

Usually your mom was fair between you two so you let your sister get away with it this time. You looked across the table at her while she shot you a cheshire grin before ripping into her seconds. You were about to look away when your sister jolted in her seat as if she had been surprised by a pinch. She continued eating as if she hadn't noticed it herself but from your point of view it had looked like she had stretched outward in all directions. Her clothes looked more stressed and cleavage of her shirt was distorted by the extra size.

Were you imagining this?
1551231.title: At dinner

choices: She grows again and finishes the cake
15512311.content:
You got up, beginning to clear away the used dishes. Your mom stops you suddenly however, "Wait, wait! I almost forgot I made a surprise dessert!" She cheerfully dashed to the fridge ans began rummaging around. You got your hopes up that she had made your favorite, cheese cake. She rarely made it as, in her words, it takes such a long time to make.

Your mom finally emerged from the fridge with a huge.... Double chocolate cake. Your sister's favorite. You were sure this one took much longer to make and yet here it was.

You watched as your sister finished devouring her seconds. She had been using her hands to finish the last of the chicken, she dropped it to her plate and belched louder than you'd ever heard. "DOUBLE CHOC?!" She giddily screamed. She pushed herself from the table and bounced passed you. As she passed you couldn't help but notice her head reaching your shoulders and the fact that her clothes looked like they were about to explode. In fact, it looked like they had just dug into her even more....

"Oh my God, thank you mom." She took the huge cake from her grasp.

"Let grab a knife so you two can eat some."

"Oh, don't worry, I don't want any." You said dejected by the lack of cheesecake. You watched your sisters eyes grow wider at hearing the cake was now all for her.
15512311.title: Your mom surprises your sister with her favorit...

155123111.content:
You watched as you could see her bra strap digging into her through her shirt. Her back bulged around it and stressed the fabric of the shirt, standing next to your mom you could actually see she was now the same height as her at 5'4.

You thought about bringing it up but you doubted she would hear you over her delight for cake. She was beaming as she took the plate from your mom and carried it over to the table.

"Enjoy, dear!" Your mom said as she placed a knife and small plate next to your sister, expecting her to cut a slice. "I'll leave the dishes to you kids, I'm going to watch some T.V." she said as she left the room.

You continued to wash up the dishes, watching your sister out of the corner of your eye. You could still see her staring at the cake happily. Suddenly she sharply dug her hand into it, tearing a hand full out of the frosting covered cake and jamming it into her mouth.

At this you stopped washing and turned to face your sister. She was now using both hands to devour the cake at breakneck speeds. "What- what are you doing?" You asked. She ignored you, focused only on chewing, swallowing and stuffing her fave with heaping hand fulls of cake. "Hey?" You tried to get her attention again.

She had hit the halfway point of the cake and had started to slow down slowly. She swallowed hard and you could visibly see a huge lump of cake travel down her throat on it's way to her stomach.

Oblivious to your attempts of getting her attention she carried on to completely obliterate the cake, leaving only a few crumbs on the plate while she licked the frosting off of her fingers. Now that she had finished you could see her eyes snap back into consciousness, as if she had come out of a trance.

"Sis, what the hell...." you didn't even finish your question as you stared at her in confusion.

"I don't know... I was just so hungry." She giggled, "and i love this cake." She went back to licking the frosting off of her fingers.

"Why are you acting so weird. And did you know you've had a growth spurt or something?" You finally dropped the elephant in the room on her lap. Her eyes flicked over to you in shock.

"Are you serious?" She jumped up and rushed over to you, clearly measuring herself against you. Realization of her new stature dawned on her as she was staring at you.
155123111.title: She grows again and finishes the cake

1552.content:
Original Author: infinity421

So who grows from the trigger word?
1552.title: Word Trigger Growth

15522.content:
Original Author: infinity421

So who grows? A sister or a daughter?
15522.title: A sister or daughter

choices: Your little sister, 7 years old and average height
Your BIG sister, 18 years old and 6'7"
Your twin sister, 16 years old and average height for her age
155221.content:
Original Author: infinity421

You wake up, tired and somewhat annoyed at having to get up, but you force your body to roll out of bed anyway, and walk out into the hallway, intending to enter the bathroom, when-

Crash!

The impact of the other body smacking into you pushes you into the floor, face down. You hear a feminine voice say,
"Oops! Sorry, bro!"

Ah. That meant it was...
155221.title: A sister

choices: Grows until her head is touching the ceiling - you triggered her growth!
Asks if you want to hang out with her
1552212.content:
Original Author: infinity421

You feel Amy's arms hoist you to your feet and push you into her body, enveloping you in a hug. Amy was your big sister, being three years older than you. Emphasis on the word 'big'.

Amy towered over everyone you knew at a massive six foot seven, and even had to stoop slightly for most door frames due to her height. Her doctor even said that she was still growing, and could well reach seven foot even by the time she finished growing.

Amy releases you from the hug, allowing you to regain your balance. You grin and feign annoyance, saying "Damnit, Amy, why do you have to be so big?"

Amy...
1552212.title: Your BIG sister

15522121.content:
Original Author: infinity421

Suddenly, Amy lurches taller, and taller, growing in quick spurts. Her head quickly crashing into the ceiling with a loud CRUNCH! Amy shakes her head before she looks down at you, smiling.

Has she realised she has grow , or does she remember always being this tall?
15522121.title: Grows until her head is touching the ceiling - ...

choices: She's as tall as the house.
The house comes up to her knee.
The house comes up to her ankle.
155221211.content:
Original Author: Rian

"I don't know bro, why'd you have to be so short?" She grins down at you, Hardly even missing a beat.

"Did... you just get taller?" you can't help but ask.

"Nah. You're just shrinking. Soon you'll be eye level with the chairs." She laughs. It becomes obvious to you that she doesn't even realize she's grown at all.

"Hey. Want to go outside?" you suggest, not wanting to cause anything with what you're about to do.

"And stretch my legs? Are you kidding bro?" She giggles, making her way to the door as quick as she can.

You look up at your now truly gigantic sister, wondering if you should actually try this... eventually curiosity gets the best of you.

"Really though. You're just so..." you pause for a second. "big." you finish. As if on que, your sister begins spurting up again, higher and higher, untill...
155221211.title: She remembers being this tall.

choices: The house comes up to her waist.
The house comes up to her kneecaps.
1552212111.content:
Original Author: unknown

As soon as you triggered her growth, your already huge sister starts to grow and grow. She eventually becomes as tall as the house. She leans on it, "So, how's it going, tiny?"

"So, you're not aware at all about you growing just now?"

"What are you talking about?"

You confirm your theory, "Nothing at all. Anyway, how did you get so... big?"

The growth is triggered again. How big does she get?
1552212111.title: She's as tall as the house.

1553.content:
Original Author: D-man72

Alternate universe: You find yourself in a universe not your own. In here, it looks normal at first glance, but you find that all (or one) women are slowly growing.

A touch of growth: When a woman comes into contact with a certain abject, she grows in small increments, the bigger the object, the bigger the growth. But each object can only grow her once. What's even more bizarre, only you seem to notice her growth!
1553.title: Other

15532.content:
Original Author: infinity421

Okay, let's have the first candidate for growth-by-touch:

Your sister Lily is just over six years old, and is usually sweet and kind - to you, at least. To almost everyone else, she is extremely bossy, and almost always gets her way. As a result of this she is rather spoiled by your parents, possessing a massive selection of toys to play with. Her toys are always one of two types of toys: plushie animals, or inflatable animals, the majority of both being rather large, and, coupled with the amount of them she had, often leaving very little space in her bedroom.

One day, however, your parents will give Lily something she has had her eyes on for a very long time: a massive inflatable dinosaur, which is almost seven feet tall! However, once the massive toy is fully inflated, and she begins to play with it - somehow persuading you to join her - Lily touches it, and grows several inches taller. Only you seem to notice this, however, and you quickly realise, to your horror, that whenever Lily touches a toy of any kind in the shape of an animal, she will experience a growth spurt.

Needless to say, Lily will end up growing very, very big indeed, thanks to the sheer volume of toys she possesses.
15532.title: A touch of growth

155322.content:
Original Author: D-man72

Paulina is a kind girl, 17 years old and exactly five and a half feet tall. Though she is somewhat shy with people, even you sometimes, even though your friends. Paulina came from a rich family, so she has developed a love for jewelry. Since her birthday was coming up, you dicided to give her a neckless containing a blue jewel. But something is strange with that jewel, since it had caused her to grow a couple inches.

What worse though, is that whenever she touches any of her jewelry, she seems to grow from it! With only you noticing any kind of growth from her! So, will this be your choice?
155322.title: Paulina

15533.content:
Original Author: D-man72

Strange dream: You start to expirence very strange dreams, of growth any many forms happening to women. However, you find out that these dreams are affecting the real world! Weather it be a girl suddenly becoming gigantic, slowly growing, or growing by any other means, only you notice, since these are your dreams.
15533.title: Strange dream.

choices: Your sister, originally 5', grew to 6'1". But do you remember?
Some other girl becoming taller/you shrinking a bit?
155331.content:
Original Author: D-man72

(A/N: forgot to say, the character can have a foggy memory, not remembering a girls original height. Ex: A girl was 5'4" before your dream, but is now 6'3", but you can't remember her being 5'4".)

You wake up, confused by your dream, you usally had dreams that made no sense, but this was different. You try to remember your dream, what you had seen happen in the dream was...
155331.title: Strange dreams

choices: Go on with the day, maybe remember more of your dream.
Skip to the end of the day.
1553311.content:
Original Author: D-man72

You remember seeing you sister, Vivian, in the dream. But she was growing, she was originally only five feet, but she had grown in the dream to be about 6'1". You try to remember the time when she was five feet tall... But you can't, seems your memory is a bit foggy. You decide to leave it and get out of bed to start the day. As you finish putting on your clothes, you run into your sister while heading to get breakfast.

"Hey bro." She says to you.

"Hey Vivi." You say, looking up at her slightly. You won't short, you were 5'10", but you sister was now 6'1.

"Getting lunch?" She asked.

"Yup, the usual." You say, getting the bread and butter out. Vivian chuckles before heading to the door. "Where are you going?"

"To see a friend." She said, with a good bye, she was out of the house.
1553311.title: Your sister, originally 5', grew to 6'1...

choices: Your best friend, growing in front of you to be about 7'.
A random stranger, who appears to be around 8 and a half feet tall.
15533112.content:
Original Author: D-man72

You lie in bed, about to fall asleep, Vivian called you, and said she will be gone for awhile, not giving you an exact time. As you close your eyes, you can't help but remember you past dream. You wonder if something like it would happen again. You finally relax, and drift off into a dream of...
15533112.title: Skip to the end of the day.

choices: You shrinking a bit. To just above 5'.
Some stranger becoming taller through short growth spurts.
1553312.content:
Original Author: D-man72

You think, but it doesn't seem to be coming to you. But then you remember, it was about...
1553312.title: Some other girl becoming taller/you shrinking a...

info.brief_description: Gentle women of all kinds getting really, really big.
info.description:
This is a resurrected interactive about very big, very gentle women. Important rules are:

1. There must be a woman who is a giga giantess or who is on her way to becoming one.
2. No adult stuff.
